title: Financial Due Diligence Analyst - M&A Transaction (CPA Preferred)
description:
Project Overview:

I'm acquiring a digital marketing agency (~$1.3M USD annual revenue) and need an experienced financial analyst to conduct due diligence and Quality of Earnings (QoE) analysis. This is a one-time project with potential for ongoing work if you perform well.



About the Target Company:

- Digital marketing agency (SEO and PPC services)

- Approximately $1.3M USD in annual revenue

- Carve-out transaction (being separated from a parent company)

- Service-based business with recurring client retainers

- Small team (under 10 people)



What You'll Do:

1. Financial Analysis & Normalization: Review 2-3 years of profit & loss statements and balance sheets. Identify and adjust for owner add-backs and one-time expenses. Normalize EBITDA to show true earning power. Analyze revenue quality (recurring vs. one-time, client concentration).



2. Carve-Out Analysis: Identify costs currently covered by the parent company. Estimate true standalone operating costs. Flag any shared services that will need to be replaced.



3. Working Capital Review: Calculate normalized working capital. Review accounts receivable aging and collectability. Identify any seasonal patterns.



4. Risk Assessment: Client concentration analysis. Key person dependencies. Contract review for red flags. Revenue sustainability assessment.



Deliverables:

- Quality of Earnings report (15-25 pages with supporting schedules)

- Normalized EBITDA bridge/waterfall

- Working capital analysis

- Executive summary of findings and deal risks

- 30-minute video call to present findings



Timeline: 2-3 weeks from receiving financial documents



Required Qualifications:

- CPA (Philippine or US) or equivalent accounting certification

- 3+ years experience in financial analysis, audit, or advisory

- Experience with business valuation or M&A due diligence (strongly preferred)

- Advanced Excel skills (pivot tables, financial modeling)

- Excellent written English - report must be clear and professional

- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines



Preferred Qualifications:

- Previous QoE or due diligence experience

- Familiarity with service-based or agency businesses

- Experience with US GAAP or financial reporting standards



What I'll Provide:

- Complete financial statements (P&L, balance sheet) for 2-3 years

- Tax returns if available

- Client revenue breakdown

- Accounts receivable aging

- Direct access to me for questions

- Access to seller for clarification calls if needed



Budget: $1,500 USD fixed fee depending on experience and scope

title: Interior Designer for Small Modern Waterfront Office Remodel
description:
I’m looking for an interior designer to create modern, inspiring design plans for my small waterfront office in Kinsale, Ireland. The space has marina views and I want to fully redesign it for beauty, function, and creativity.



Project scope:

 • Dimensions: 116.5” x 299” (~9.7 ft x 24.9 ft / 2.96 m x 7.59 m)

 • Goals:

 • Maximize natural light with new windows

 • Modern kitchenette with full fridge, custom cabinetry & small bar/stool area

 • Updated bathroom with storage

 • Two small standing desks by windows

 • Cozy podcast/video area with couch, table, mics & inspiring background

 • Stylish, modern lighting plan



What I need from you:

 • Mood board & style concept

 • 2–3 layout options

 • 3D renderings of chosen design

 • Furniture, fixtures, and finishes suggestions

 • Lighting recommendations



Ideal fit:

 • Experience designing small office or creative spaces

 • Strong modern aesthetic

 • Ability to deliver clear, build-ready concept plans remotely



To apply:

Send examples of similar projects, your process, and estimated cost/timeline.

title: SEO Specialist
description:
Who We Are:

At Juris Digital, we help law firms achieve sustainable growth through organic and paid search marketing is not just what Juris Digital delivers — it’s what drives our SEOs daily. Our team is smart and intelligent and knows what it takes to drive real revenue growth, and cares about the bottom-line outcomes. We’re competitive and collaborative, like to have fun, and love adding new tea
mbers. If you are seeking a dynamic workplace and new challenges, we want to hear from you!



Who we’re looking for:

The SEO Specialist is a contractor-only position. You will ensure and implement digital marketing and SEO tasks such as content publishing, keyword research, onsite and offsite SEO, link building, content promotion and outreach, and copywriting. The SEO Specialist is also responsible for helping prepare monthly client reports.



Your day-to-day will be spent conducting data-driven keyword research, support with essential SEO and client management tasks. You’ll have confidence in your SEO knowledge and how to communicate it with your team, and you’ll grow and learn together with your team, holding yourself accountable.



What you will do:

- Publishing and optimizing new content in WordPress.

- Business listing management

- Google Business Profile, Bing Places, and Apple Places management

- Copywriting for non-legal content

- Link-building outreach (scholarships, community initiatives)

- Data wrangling and analysis for advanced content and SEO recommendations

- Responsible for making sure clients stay within budget. Although this will be everyone’s job.



How you’ll do it:

Embody Juris Digital’s core values: Excellence, Fun, Creativity, Empathy, Transparency and Relationships

- Curiosity: Ask really good questions of clients that drive creative solutions. You are compelled by the desire to learn more, ask more, and find new solutions for your partners that haven’t been previously thought of.

- Work Ethic: Come to work to achieve. Use your time wisely to create opportunities, and understand that success results from hard work and diligence.

- Intelligence: You can quickly learn and retain new information, processes, and abilities.

- Coachability: Seek out and implement coaching on personal performance in order to improve. React calmly to criticism and are open to new ideas and changes in the process.

- Self-motivation / Drive: You are driven to exceed minimum standards by your personal “why.”

- Resilience and Perseverance: This isn’t your first rodeo. You weather your roles’ inevitable ups and downs with grace, professionalism, grit, and determination.



Our ideal candidate will be or have:

- 3+ years of SEO experience

- Proven track record of driving client success in a digital marketing environment.

- Strong project management skills with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.

- On-Page SEO

- Technical Crawls/Updates

- Excellent written and verbal communication skills – able to simplify complex topics in a friendly and approachable manner

- Please put a * next to your name when applying.

- You have significant knowledge in / experience with

*WordPress 

*Google Analytics 

*Clickup

*Callrail

*SEO competitor research tools (Ahrefs, ScreamingFrog, etc.)

- General knowledge of software applications i.e., Clickup, Google Apps, etc.

- Your unique strengths – if you don’t match everything we’re looking for, tell us why you’d be a great fit.

- Must possess strong English-speaking skills.

- Must be available to work 9 AM – 5 PM Mountain Time (MT)

title: WordPress Content Transfer Specialist
description:
We are seeking a detail-oriented and technically skilled WordPress Content Transfer Specialist to assist in migrating, formatting, and organizing website content into WordPress. This role requires strong familiarity with WordPress CMS, page builders (e.g., Gutenberg, Elementor, WPBakery), and a sharp eye for accuracy and consistency across digital content.

You will play a key role in ensuring the integrity and presentation of content during the transition from legacy systems, staging sites, or external sources into a live WordPress environment.



**Key Responsibilities**

- Transfer and format existing content (text, images, videos, metadata) into WordPress pages and posts.

- Maintain consistent layout, styling, and structure during content migration using theme settings or page builders.

- Set up proper categories, tags, featured images, permalinks, and SEO metadata.

- Ensure all internal links, media, and downloadable files are properly linked and functional.

- Identify and resolve content formatting or styling issues post-migration.

- Use plugins like ACF, Carbon Fields, or custom post types where needed to place content properly.



**Required Skills & Qualifications**

- Proven experience working with WordPress, including Gutenberg and popular page builders.

- Strong attention to detail, especially with formatting, design consistency, and content structure.

- Basic understanding of HTML and CSS for troubleshooting content formatting issues.

- Familiarity with SEO best practices in content formatting and metadata setup.

- Experience working with media libraries and optimizing images for web use.

- Ability to follow structured processes and naming conventions.

- Excellent time management and organizational skills.

- Strong written and verbal communication.

- Must be available to work 9 AM – 5 PM Mountain Time (MT)



**Preferred Qualifications**

- Experience with content migration tools or plugins.

- Familiarity with WPML, Polylang, or multilingual content management.

- Understanding of accessibility standards (WCAG) and mobile-first formatting.

- Knowledge of custom fields (ACF, Carbon Fields) and custom post types.

- To confirm you've read the full job post, please put an asterisk (*) next to your name when applying.



**How to Apply**

Please submit your resume and briefly highlight your hands-on experience with WordPress content management, including any work using page builders like Elementor, Gutenberg, or WPBakery.

Be sure to mention your familiarity with formatting standards, SEO metadata, and content migration tools or plugins if applicable.

title: Google Ads - Tracking Implementation Specialist
description:
We are seeking a detail-oriented and technically proficient Tracking Implementation Specialist to support our paid media efforts by ensuring precise and comprehensive conversion tracking. This role requires deep knowledge of Google Tag Manager (GTM), Google Ads conversion tracking, and CallRail integration. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience configuring form submission and phone call goals for PPC campaigns and will be crucial in aligning tracking infrastructure with campaign objectives.



**Key Responsibilities**

Tag Management and Configuration

- Set up, audit, and manage tags, triggers, and variables in Google Tag Manager (GTM)

- Implement conversion tracking for form submissions and phone calls through GTM

- Collaborate with developers or use GTM tools (e.g., data layer) to ensure accurate firing of tags



Google Ads Conversion Tracking

- Configure and verify Google Ads goals for both lead forms and phone calls

- Ensure goals are properly attributed and feeding into Google Ads reporting for optimization

- Regularly test and troubleshoot conversion tags to maintain data accuracy



Call Tracking Integration

- Fully set up and integrate CallRail with Google Ads and GTM

- Ensure dynamic number insertion (DNI) is functioning correctly across ad campaigns

- Track and report on call conversion events in both Google Ads and Google Analytics



Audit & Quality Control

- Perform ongoing audits of tracking setups across accounts to ensure reliability

- Identify discrepancies or tracking failures and resolve them promptly

- Maintain detailed documentation of tracking implementations and changes



Collaboration

- Work with PPC strategists and campaign managers to align tracking goals with KPIs

- Communicate technical tracking concepts in a way that is understandable to non-technical tea
mbers and clients



**Qualifications**

- 2–4+ years of experience in digital marketing or technical implementation roles

- Proven experience setting up Google Ads goals (calls and form submissions)

- Strong proficiency with Google Tag Manager, Google Ads, and Google Analytics

- Experience with CallRail implementation and tracking setup

- Ability to read and work with basic HTML and JavaScript is a plus

- Familiarity with using browser dev tools and tag debugging tools (e.g., Tag Assistant, GTM preview)

- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail

- Strong communication skills and ability to manage multiple tracking tasks across projects

- Must be available to work 9 AM – 5 PM Mountain Time (MT)

- To confirm you've read the full job post, please put an asterisk (*) next to your name when applying.



**How to Apply**

Please submit your resume and highlight any hands-on experience you have with GTM, Google Ads tracking, and CallRail integration.

- Proven experience in client onboarding or account management within a digital marketing context.

- Proficiency with Google Suite and social media platforms.

title: Real Estate Social Media & CRM Virtual Assistant (GHL Experience Preferred)
description:
Luxury Real Estate Virtual Assistant



Business Hours: USA – Pacific Time

This is a foundational, early-stage role. There are currently limited formal SOPs or systems in place, so the ideal candidate must be organized, adaptable, and comfortable building structure from scratch.



This position has long-term growth potential for the right candidate.



Key Responsibilities:



--Social Media & Brand Marketing

Manage and grow luxury real estate Instagram and related platforms

Create content calendars

Write captions and high-end property descriptions

Coordinate visuals with designers

Monitor engagement and performance

Real Estate Marketing & Lead Generation

Develop CRM-based nurture sequences

--CRM, Data Management & Operations

Organize backend systems and file structures

Administrative & Operational Support

Assist with early-stage setup and backend systems

Manage internal
s and calendar organization

Provide general operational support as needed



--Required Tools & Technical Skills

Candidates must be proficient in:

GoHighLevel (CRM, workflows, pipelines, automation)

Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Drive, Gmail, Calendar)

Canva (basic design and formatting)

Experience using these tools in a business or operations support role is required.



--Qualifications & Ideal Candidate Profile

Fluent in English (spoken and written)

Excellent written communication skills

Highly detail-oriented

Strong organizational and documentation skills

Holds a Bachelor’s degree

Strong focus on accuracy, process, and structure

Naturally introverted personality type preferred

Comfortable working in a build-from-scratch environment

Able to work US Pacific Time hours consistently

title: content strategist and editor
description:
Overview



I’m an NFL veteran turned entrepreneur building multiple businesses (logistics, real estate, medspa). I document the real journey — building companies from the ground up — under my brand, Trenchwork.

Edit with strong hooks (first 3–5 seconds matter)



Optimize for retention, watch time, and engagement



Repurpose long content into multiple short clips

Help develop recurring content series (vlogs, motivational clips, business breakdowns, etc.)



Provide input on content direction and performance improvement

Proven experience editing for Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, TikTok



Strong understanding of storytelling structure



Ability to think strategically about audience growth



Fast turnaround times



Clean, high-impact editing style (not overproduced)



Understands motivational / entrepreneurial content tone



Can show examples of content that has performed well



Bonus If You Have



Experience building personal brands



Understanding of business/entrepreneurship content



Ability to analyze analytics and adjust content strategy



Thumbnail and title optimization experience (YouTube)

title: MAKE UP TO $2000 per Month!!I INSTAGRAM MESSAGING SETTER | WORK FROM HOME | GREAT BONUSES !!!
description:
If you’re fast, detail-oriented, and know how to turn conversations into qualified calls, keep reading.



We’re hiring a serious Instagram DM Setter who has experience and can follow structure, qualify properly, and move business owners toward booking a call.



This is a performance-based position with strong earning potential.



Schedule



Monday–Friday

What You’ll Do



Reply quickly to inbound DMs, comments, likes and story replies



Send personalized outbound messages per hour

Qualify business owners properly



Book qualified calls for the sales team

Instagram

Compensation Structure

Commission:

$50 per deal milestone



5 deals ? $250 bonus

10 deals ? $500 bonus

15 deals ? $750 bonus

20 deals ? $1,000 bonus



Example Monthly Earnings

400 base + 250 commission + 250 bonus = $900



10 deals:

400 base + 500 commission + 500 bonus = $1,400



15 deals:

400 base + 750 commission + 750 bonus = $1,900



20 deals:

400 base + 1,000 commission + 1,000 bonus = $2,400



There is no income cap.

Your performance determines your pay.



???? How To Apply (Read Carefully)



We only review applications from people who follow instructions exactly.



If you skip a step, your application will not be considered.



Step 1



Send an
 to:







Step 2



Use this exact subject line:



DM Setter SOP Test – Completed



Step 3



Inside your
 include:



Your full name



Your timezone



Your internet speed (upload + download)



On a scale from 1-10 whats the chances you having a power issue



Do you have a back up generator?



Your typing speed (WPM)



???? DM SETTER SOP TEST (MANDATORY)



SOP DOCUMENT LINK BELOW





Do NOT use ChatGPT or AI to answer these questions.



We have tested this SOP extensively and know exactly how generic AI answers sound.



If we detect robotic formatting, overly polished textbook answers, or AI-style structuring, you will be automatically disqualified.



We are looking for real understanding.



Short. Clear. Direct. Human.



Part 1 – Flow Understanding



Why do we ask how their jobs are coming in (referrals, Google, etc.) before offering a call?



If someone says they are fully booked, why do we NOT immediately drop them?



Why do we ask for the phone number BEFORE offering times?



Answer in 2–4 sentences each.



Part 2 – Branching Scenario



A business owner replies:



“Mostly referrals right now.”



Write the next 2 exact messages you would send.



Do not summarize. Write the messages exactly as you would send them.



Part 3 – Fully Booked Objection



They reply:



“We’re pretty booked right now.”



Write your exact response that keeps authority and positions growth.



Part 4 – Price Question



They ask:



“How much does it cost?”



Write your exact response.



Then explain (in 1–2 sentences) why that response works psychologically.



Part 5 – Dead Conversation Recovery



A lead stops replying after you asked where their jobs are coming from.



24 hours later — what exact message do you send?



Attention to Detail Check



At the very bottom of your
, include this sentence:



“Consistency beats intensity.”



If that sentence is missing, we will assume you did not read carefully.



We are looking for serious applicants only.



If you follow instructions, understand the SOP, and can execute daily — this role has strong long-term earning potential.



Apply correctly.

title: Experienced Graphic Designer

title: Video Data Entry Specialist — Warehouse Operations (Ongoing)
description:
We are looking for a detail-oriented VA to watch warehouse conveyor footage and log specific operational events into a structured spreadsheet we provide.



This is an ongoing, long-term role. If you do good work, there is a significant and growing volume of footage coming — this can become a stable, recurring source of income for the right person. We are not looking for a one-time contractor; we are building a small, reliable team.



You will receive 3–4 hour video files regularly and are expected to return completed data within 72 hours.



WHAT YOU WILL DO

- Watch footage at reduced speed (0.5x)

- Log wave start/end times, box counts, and pallet counts per wave

- Log forklift door open/close events and durations

- Flag anything unclear in a notes column



REQUIREMENTS

- Extremely high attention to detail — this is a counting and timing role

- Comfortable watching and rewinding video footage repeatedly

- Proficient with Excel (basic formulas, no programming required)

- Reliable internet and stable computer setup

- Available to complete assignments within 72-hour turnaround windows



COMPENSATION

- $3–5/hr depending on experience and test performance

- Paid per session (hourly tracked)

- Steady, recurring work for top performers



TO APPLY

Please respond with:

1. A brief description of any data entry or video-based work you have done before

2. Your available hours per week

3. Your internet speed (download Mbps)

title: WordPress Developer - Full Time - US Hours
description:
Who We Are:



At Juris Digital, we help law firms achieve sustainable growth through organic and paid search marketing. Growth isn’t just what Juris Digital delivers, it’s what drives our team daily. We’re smart, strategic, and results-focused, and we care deeply about bottom-line outcomes for our clients.



We’re competitive and collaborative, like to have fun, and love adding new tea
mbers. If you’re seeking a dynamic workplace, meaningful challenges, and the opportunity to build high-performing websites that drive real revenue, we want to hear from you.



Who We’re Looking For:



The WordPress Developer is a contractor-only position. You will be responsible for developing, maintaining, and optimizing WordPress websites for performance, usability, and SEO best practices.



Strong WordPress experience is essential for this role. You understand how to build, troubleshoot, and improve WordPress sites efficiently and cleanly. Full-stack capabilities are a plus, but deep WordPress expertise is the priority.



Your day-to-day will include building new pages, implementing technical updates, improving site speed, troubleshooting issues, and collaborating closely with our SEO and content teams to execute strategy. You’ll be confident in your technical knowledge, proactive in solving problems, and accountable for delivering high-quality work.



What You Will Do:

- Build, customize, and maintain WordPress websites

- Develop custom page templates and theme modifications

- Implement SEO recommendations (technical fixes, schema, site structure improvements)

- Improve site speed and Core Web Vitals performance

- Troubleshoot plugin conflicts, theme issues, and hosting-related problems

- Manage staging environments and website deployments

- Perform regular site audits and updates (plugins, themes, WordPress core)

- Collaborate with SEO Specialists and Content teams to implement strategy

- Ensure websites follow best practices for UX, accessibility, and performance



How You’ll Do It:

- Embody Juris Digital’s core values: Excellence, Fun, Creativity, Empathy, Transparency, and Relationships

- Curiosity: You ask thoughtful questions to fully understand project requirements before building.

- Work Ethic: You take ownership of tasks and execute efficiently.

- Intelligence: You quickly learn new tools, plugins, and systems.

- Coachability: You welcome feedback and continuously improve your development process.

- Self-Motivation / Drive: You hold yourself accountable and take initiative.

- Resilience & Perseverance: You approach technical challenges with patience and problem-solving grit.



Our Ideal Candidate Will Be or Have:

- 3+ years of WordPress development experience

- Strong understanding of PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

- Experience customizing themes and working with page builders (Elementor, WPBakery, etc.)

- Familiarity with technical SEO implementation

- Experience improving site performance and Core Web Vitals

- Comfort working in staging environments and with hosting platforms

- Strong troubleshooting and debugging skills

- Excellent written and verbal communication skills

- Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously

- Must possess strong English-speaking skills

- Please put a * next to your name when applying.

- Must be available to work 9 AM – 5 PM Mountain Time (MT)



Bonus (Not Required but Preferred):

- Experience with full-stack development

- Experience working with law firm websites

- Familiarity with ClickUp or other project management tools

- Experience with Google Analytics and Search Console

title: Implementation Coordinator
description:
Company: Conserva

Location: Remote (Must work according to Eastern Standard Time)

Schedule: Full-time, Monday–Friday, 11AM–8PM Eastern Time



About Conserva

Conserva is a forward-thinking company dedicated to delivering solar maintenance services and exceptional

support to our clients. We pride ourselves on high-quality service and fostering an inclusive, remote-first

work culture. We are excited to welcome talented professionals to join our dynamic team.



Position: Implementation Coordinator



What You'll Do:

• Schedule and Manage Service Visits: Coordinate and schedule inspection, cleaning, and upsell

service visits across our customer base. Proactively manage the calendar to ensure timely coverage

and full preparation before each job.

• Organize and Maintain Tasks in ClickUp: Build, update, and manage tasks within ClickUp to track

job statuses, service agreements, audits, and follow-ups. Ensure every task contains complete and

accurate information prior to dispatch.

• Coordinate with Service Providers: Serve as the primary point of contact for field service providers.

Communicate job details clearly, answer questions, and ensure service providers have everything they

need to complete visits successfully.

• Routing and Map-Based Scheduling: Review geographic service areas and use mapping tools to

build efficient daily routing for service visits, minimizing drive time while maximizing field capacity.

• Conduct Audits and Quality Checks: Perform regular audits of task lists, service agreements,

unpaid accounts, and customer statuses to maintain data integrity and ensure timely follow-up across

all open items.

• Manage Customer and Internal Communications: Respond to service team inquiries, send 24-hour

appointment reminders, follow up on unpaid balances, and escalate issues as needed to keep

operations running smoothly.

• Monitor Dashboards and Analytics: Review ClickUp dashboards and performance data daily to

identify incomplete tasks, bottlenecks, or missing information. Resolve or escalate issues promptly.

• Support SP Onboarding: Assist in onboarding new service providers, ensuring they understand

workflows and have access to the tools and information required for their roles.



What We're Looking For:

• Strong Communication Skills: Clear written and verbal communication is essential for coordinating

across internal teams and external service providers.

• Organizational Excellence: Ability to manage multiple moving parts simultaneously, prioritize

effectively, and maintain meticulous attention to detail in a remote environment.

• Process-Oriented Mindset: Comfortable working within structured systems and SOPs; able to

identify gaps and take initiative to keep workflows on track.

• Tech-Savviness: Hands-on experience with ClickUp or similar project management tools; familiarity

with CRMs, mapping tools, and spreadsheets. Ability to adapt quickly to new software.

• Experience: Previous experience in scheduling, operations coordination, field service support, or a

similar administrative role is strongly preferred.

• Remote Readiness: A reliable internet connection, a quiet workspace, and the discipline and

self-motivation to work independently and meet daily expectations.



What We Offer:

• Competitive Compensation: $1,000 USD per month (with two paydays per month).

• Career Growth: Opportunities for professional advancement and development through ongoing

training and mentorship.

• Inclusive, Remote-First Environment: Join a diverse international team dedicated to supporting your

success no matter where you are located.

• Industry Impact: Be part of a company that is committed to renewable energy and sustainable

solutions.





Ready to Make a Difference?

As the first step of the process, please use 
 to create a free short video of yourself speaking

and include the link to this video in your application message.

title: Online Sales Chat Representative - Full Time
description:
Selling to and upselling over online chat to people who have indicated interest in the product. This is a SALES position, NOT a CUSTOMER SUPPORT position. We are looking for COMPETITIVE, DRIVEN, and HUNGRY candidates. Our standards are HIGH. You will work as a part of a TEAM, but you are responsible for YOUR OWN SUCCESS. The ideal candidate is between the ages of 18-25 and has ENERGY and AMBITION.







Compensation:



- You will be paid $3 per Hour, and 3% commission if your commission exceeds your hourly.

– No cap on earnings. The more you sell, the more you earn.

- Performance-Based Bonuses – Meaning extra rewards and top tier earnings available for you high achievers!



After your trial period you will be expected to consistently exceed your hourly. If you are unable to meet the daily sales target after the trial period, you will be let go. You will be expected to make enough sales to AT LEAST earn $40 per shift. With skill and motivation a salesperson can exceed this amount multiple times over.





Hard Requirements:



- Adequate internet connection

- Adequate PC setup

- EXCELLENT written and GOOD spoken English

- SPEED. You may be juggling 10 or more chats at the same time and each requires your full attention to EARN

- WORK ETHIC: You will be expected to stay focused and active for the entire duration of your shift

Everything else can be taught.





Nice to have:



- Understanding of modern internet culture

- Exposure to media from the US

- Charisma

- Post-secondary education (we'll accept it as an indicator of competence as long as you can provide us with the diploma)



This is NOT an easy job, but it can be VERY LUCRATIVE with talent and especially hard work.

 



End note:

Applications written by AI will be detected and rejected immediately. Chosen candidates are to expect a thorough interview (1 hour). No hard feelings if the interview is cut short, it means we have d
 you're not a good fit.



Write Banana in your application if you read this all the way through



Full time ONLY

Join Our Team as an E-commerce Customer Service Virtual Assistant!



We’re looking for a reliable, detail-oriented, and friendly Customer Virtual Assistant to be the organized voice behind our growing e-commerce brands. If you love turning customer questions into high-five 
nts and navigating the world of online brands with ease, we want to meet you!



What You Will Do? (Roles & Responsibilities)



You’ll be an important part of our expanding team, helping deliver fast, seamless, and professional experiences to every customer. Your daily mission includes:



1. Heart of Communication: Replies to customer
s and live chats using our macro templates. Will also handle occasional inbound or outbound calls. Should be able to create own
 responses with a warm, professional tone for more complicated cases. 



2. Order Mastery: Keep orders moving smoothly by updating information when needed, managing shipping updates, tracking information, and status changes with precision. 



3. Financial Accuracy: Safeguard revenue by accurately handling refunds, resends, and credit adjustments while reconciling transactions across our various payment processors. 



4. Problem Solver: We need someone who is resolution-focused, detail-oriented, and able to follow instructions and processes accurately and consistently based on our Customer Service SOP. Include the word "wellness" in your application. Should also know how to collaborate fairly with our management and fulfillment team to squash concerns quickly. 



5. Keeper of Our Product Catalog: Can oversee inventory updates and play a key role in executing new product launches by creating, optimizing, and publishing product listings with accuracy and attention to detail.



6. Other administrative and data entry tasks as they come along. 



What You Should Have? (Mandatory Requirements)



- 2+ years of e-commerce or customer support experience (WooCommerce preferred) in a work-from-home environment. 

- Excellent written and spoken English

- Experience handling
 tickets using CRMs like Front, Gorgias, Zendesk, Reamaze, etc.

- Familiarity with E-commerce tools like Shopify and WooCommerce, and 3PL or warehouse coordination. 

- Strong attention to detail and problem-solving ability.

- Quiet workspace and headset for occasional calls.

- Reliable internet connection and availability

- Proven ability to manage time effectively and prioritize tasks.

- Demonstrated ownership and accountability for assigned tasks.



What’s in It for You? (Benefits & Compensation)



- Competitive work salary

- Flexible Remote Work: Work from the comfort of your own space.

- Growth Opportunities: Long-term, stable, and professional development opportunities. 

- Supportive Culture: A collaborative environment that values your input.



What You Need to Do? (How to Apply)



1. Send your cover letter and resume/CV. 

2. Include a 1-2 minute voice recording introducing yourself and your e-commerce experience. 

3. Include your desired monthly salary in your cover letter. 

4. Availability and working hours. 



If you are looking for a place where your hard work is matched by real opportunities to level up, you’ve found it. Come build your career and grow alongside us!

KMA Web Design is looking for a reliable, detail-oriented WordPress Web Designer/Developer for freelance project work. We value long-term working relationships, and if we are a good fit working together, there is a strong opportunity for this role to grow into a part-time or full-time position over time.

WHAT YOU’LL BE DOING

NICE TO HAVE (NOT REQUIRED)

WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR

* Clear, respectful, and reliable communicator

Please remember to include “Developer 5” in your response.

title: Cold Caller (Commercial Real Estate)
description:

, and SMS as needed

title: Executive Assistant
description:
# Executive Assistant to Founder/CEO



**Location:** Remote  

**Employment Type:** Full-Time  

**Reports To:** Founder/CEO



## About the Role



We're looking for a highly organized and proactive Executive Assistant to support our Founder/CEO across multiple ventures, with primary focus on an early-stage AI startup. This is a high-impact role where you'll be the operational backbone that protects the CEO's time and ensures seamless execution across all areas of the business.



## What You'll Do



**Protect Time & Maintain Focus**

- Manage and prioritize all incoming communications across multiple
 inboxes

- Maintain an accurate, context-rich calendar as the single source of truth

- Filter requests and route only what truly requires the CEO's attention

- Handle administrative and operational tasks independently



**Support Sales & Customer Operations**

- Keep customer tracking systems organized and up-to-date

- Coordinate discovery calls and onboarding for early customers

- Maintain clean, simple databases that support fast-moving sales cycles

- Follow up on customer-related action items



**Enable Strategic Execution**

- Prepare daily meeting agendas with all necessary context

- Research and present purchase options in clear, decision-ready formats

- Coordinate travel and accommodations

- Track projects and provide status updates



**Handle Communications**

- Draft professional responses on behalf of the CEO

- Manage speaking engagement requests and scheduling

- Coordinate with internal teams and external partners

- Ensure every communication gets a timely, clear response



## What You Bring



**Essential Skills**

- 2+ years of experience as an Executive Assistant, Chief of Staff, or similar role

- Exceptional written and verbal communication skills

- Strong organizational abilities with extreme attention to detail

- Comfortable working independently with minimal supervision

- Tech-savvy with ability to learn new tools quickly



**Critical Requirements**

- **Must be comfortable using AI tools** - We use AI extensively in our workflows and need someone who embraces technology, not fears it

- Proactive problem-solving mindset - you anticipate needs before being asked

- Discretion and confidentiality - you'll handle sensitive business and personal information

- Ability to prioritize ruthlessly - you understand what's urgent vs. important



**Bonus Points**

- Experience supporting founders in startup/tech environments

- Familiarity with SaaS, customer success, or sales operations

- Background using tools like Google Workspace, Slack, Asana, Notion, 1Password

- Understanding of customer retention or subscription business models



## What Success Looks Like



**In 30 Days:**

- CEO's inbox is at zero daily

- Calendar is accurate with all meetings properly documented

- You're handling 80% of administrative tasks independently

- Daily sync meetings run smoothly with well-prepared agendas



**In 60 Days:**

- You're proactively identifying issues before they become problems

- Customer tracking systems are clean and current

- You've built strong working relationships with key contacts

- CEO feels protected, not managed



**In 90 Days:**

- You're operating with full autonomy

- You're contributing ideas for process improvements

- CEO can focus entirely on high-value work

- You're the go-to person for making things happen



## Our Environment



- **Fast-paced:** We're building in the AI space - things move quickly

- **Remote-first:** Work from anywhere with reliable internet

- **High-trust:** We give you the context and autonomy to make decisions

- **Growth-oriented:** You'll learn about AI, SaaS, and startup operations

- **Results-focused:** We care about impact, not hours logged



## Why This Role Is Different



This isn't a typical EA position. You'll be supporting someone building at the intersection of AI and customer retention, working directly with early adopters, and helping shape how an early-stage company operates. You'll have real ownership over how things get done and direct impact on the business's success.



## How to Apply



**Please submit:**

1. Your resume

2. A brief loom video answering:

   - Why are you excited about working with AI-focused companies?

   - Describe a time you proactively solved a problem before your executive knew it existed

   - What tools or AI systems do you currently use in your work?



---



*We're an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.*

title: Remote Virtual Estimator
description:
USE THIS FORM TO SUBMIT YOUR INFORMATION. NO MESSAGES WILL BE CONSIDERED WITHOUT FORM COMPLETION. 



Profile Summary

Role Type: Remote / Virtual



Key Focus: Accuracy in cost estimation, quantity takeoffs, and bid preparation.



Ideal Candidate: A detail-oriented individual with strong mathematical skills, deep industry knowledge (e.g., construction or electrical), and the ability to work autonomously. Clear and effective communicator. C2 & C1 professional level. 



Primary Industries: Construction (Commercial/Residential)



Job Description



Core Responsibilities

Cost Estimation & Analysis: Analyze project documents, blueprints, and specifications to determine labor, material, and equipment costs.



Quantity Takeoffs: Perform detailed digital measurements and list all materials required for project completion using specialized software.



Bid Preparation: Change complex cost data into professional, competitive bid proposals and executive summaries.



Vendor & Subcontractor Coordination: Research prices, manage bids from subcontractors, and maintain relationships with suppliers.



Risk Assessment: Identify potential financial or operational risks and suggest cost-reduction or value-engineering options.



Communication: Collaborate with project managers, engineers, and clients through video conferencing,
, and virtual meetings to clarify project scopes.



Required Skills & Qualifications



Technical Proficiency: CRM Construction Online



Analytical & Math Skills: Strong ability in algebra, geometry, and financial analysis to prevent costly errors.



Experience: 

Typically requires 3–7+ years of industry experience (e.g., as a project manager, estimator) to understand field complexities.



Education/Certification: 

A bachelor's degree in Construction Management or Engineering is often preferred but not always mandatory. Experience is more attractive.



Professional certifications like Certified Professional Estimator (CPE) or Certified Estimating Professional (CEP) are highly valued.



Remote Work Competency: Self-motivated, with excellent time management skills and a secure, high-bandwidth, and home office setup.

title: Video Editor - Emotional Storytelling for Garment Releases
description:
My men's streetwear clothing brand (established in 2021) based in Los Angeles is building towards a more story-driven brand. Every garment we release carries meaning — rooted in family history, upbringing, identity, sacrifice, culture, and lived experience. These are not only product drops but stories that hold dear to the community we are planning to build.



We are looking for a video editor who understands how to translate emotion into short-form content. Think of it as a POV come with me to design clothes, but all the design choices are related to a real life story that we are proud to share.



The Role



You will turn provided storylines into emotionally compelling short-form videos centered around the story with the garment being the subject at the end. Its a story line about process and narrative of why we picked certain things.



I will provide:

 • The core story behind each piece along with a general script

 • The intended tone and message

        •.      I will have audio for the video and footage



You will:

 • Bring that story to life visually.

 • Source complementary footage that strengthens the narrative (only if needed)

 • Edit with intention — pacing, music, silence, transitions, and typography must all support the emotional weight of the story.

        •.       At the end of it, I really should feel an emotional connection



Responsibilities

 • Follow a structured storyline and build a visual arc around it.

 • Source high-quality footage that reinforces themes of identity, struggle, growth, family, or culture.

 • Use sound design and music intentionally to create emotional depth.

 • Deliver platform-ready content for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.

 • Closely match a defined storytelling style (examples will be shared).



Requirements

 • Strong proficiency in Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or equivalent.

 • Proven ability to create emotionally driven edits.

 • Strong sense of pacing and restraint — knowing when to let 
nts breathe.

 • Attention to detail in typography, color grading, and transitions.

 • Experience editing for short-form vertical platforms.



We are looking for someone who understands that storytelling requires subtlety and control not over-editing.



Test Project



Shortlisted candidates will complete a paid test.



You will receive:

 • A base storyline

 • A style reference video



Your task is to produce a short-form edit that captures the emotional tone and visual style while honoring the story provided.



We will assess:

 • Emotional execution

 • Story pacing

 • Creative judgment

 • Ability to interpret brand direction





How to Apply



Please include:

 • Links to relevant work (especially emotionally driven edits).

 • A short note explaining why storytelling-based fashion content interests you.

 • Your availability and working hours.



My brand is building a collective of stories through garments. If you know how to make people feel something through video, we want to see your work.

title: Solar Designer/Engineer
description:
About pvDocs



pvDocs is an Australian-based solar design and compliance service supporting solar retailers and installers across Australia. We specialise in pre-approvals, post-connection paperwork, design validation, and compliance review to ensure systems are approved quickly and installed correctly.



We are growing and are looking for an experienced Solar Design & DNSP Approval Specialist who understands Australian solar regulations and DNSP processes.



This role is not entry level. Proven experience working with Australian DNSPs is essential.



Key Responsibilities



• Review Australian solar contracts for electrical compliance

• Assess equipment compatibility including inverters, batteries, and panels

• Identify design improvements to increase system efficiency and compliance

• Complete DNSP pre-approvals and post-connection submissions across Australian networks

• Prepare professional Single Line Diagrams and roof layout plans

• Ensure battery integration is compliant and correctly configured

• Verify export limits, phase configuration, and protection requirements

• Communicate clearly with Australian installers and retailers regarding compliance issues



Essential Requirements



Applicants must have direct experience with Australian DNSPs. Applications without this experience will not be considered.



You must have:



• Hands-on experience submitting pre-approvals and post-connection paperwork to Australian DNSPs

• Strong understanding of Australian solar standards and grid requirements

• Experience working with networks such as Energex, Ausgrid, Endeavour Energy, Essential Energy, SAPN, Western Power or similar

• Ability to interpret Australian electrical standards and compliance requirements

• Experience designing PV and PV + Battery systems

• Proficiency creating accurate SLDs and roof layouts

• Strong knowledge of battery integration including hybrid and AC coupled systems

• Excellent attention to detail

• Strong written English skills



Preferred Skills



• Experience with OpenSolar or similar solar design software

• Understanding of export limits, phase balancing, and inverter protection settings

• Familiarity with STC documentation and Australian compliance processes



What We Offer



• Long term, stable remote role

• Work directly with an experienced Australian solar team

• Clear systems and structured workflows

• Opportunity to grow with a fast scaling solar compliance business



Important



This role requires real experience working with Australian solar networks. If you have not previously completed DNSP pre-approvals and post-connection submissions for Australian projects, please do not apply.



If you meet the above criteria and have strong Australian solar compliance experience, we would love to hear from you.



Please include:



• Summary of your experience with Australian DNSPs

• Examples of networks you have submitted to

• Years of experience in Australian solar design

• Software platforms you have used



We look forward to working with someone who understands Australian solar compliance inside and out.

We support businesses by providing reliable technical expertise, project coordination, and administrative support to help them operate efficiently.



As our workload and client projects continue to expand, we are looking for an Electrical Engineer who can contribute to technical projects while also supporting general virtual assistant tasks.

About the Role

This is a part-time position, approximately 20 hours per week with potential for growth depending on performance and business needs.



The rate starts at 10 AUD per hour, with opportunities for increase based on experience, contribution, reliability, and quality of work.



What You Will Do:

-Review and interpret electrical plans and specifications

-Support project planning and coordination

General VA Tasks


 management and client communication support

-Blog content copywriting

-Scheduling meetings and coordinating project timelines

-Data entry and documentation management

-Online research for projects and suppliers

-Organizing files and maintaining project records

-Supporting administrative and operational tasks as needed

-This role requires someone who is organized, proactive, and capable of managing multiple responsibilities efficiently.



3. Qualifications

-Degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field

-1 to 2 years of experience in electrical engineering or technical support roles

-Experience working with electrical plans, drawings, and technical documentation

-Basic understanding of electrical systems, design principles, and project workflows

-Experience using engineering or design software is an advantage



-Technical Requirements:

-Must have experience in electrical engineering tasks

-Must understand how to read and interpret electrical drawings

-Must be comfortable handling technical documentation



VA Skills Requirement:

-Must be able to perform general virtual assistant tasks effectively

-Strong experience with
 management, scheduling, and documentation

-Personal Requirements

-Strong attention to detail

-Excellent organizational skills

-Ability to work independently with minimal supervision

-Good written and verbal communication skills

-Reliable internet connection and access to a stable workstation



We are looking for someone dependable, accountable, and willing to grow with the company.



To Apply

Optional but highly recommended:

A 1-minute introduction video explaining your electrical experience and how you handle general VA tasks



Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.



We are looking forward to your applications!

title: Go High Level Email Manager + Executive Assistant
description:
We are looking for a detail-obsessed Go High Level
 Manager to own the daily execution, scheduling, and automation of all
 campaigns inside Go High Level.



This is a critical role in our business. Our
 operation runs Monday-Friday, without exception, and accuracy matters.



You will also be an executive assistant to the CEO of the company since this
 management will not take up your entire day. (About 3 hours per day for the
 management part.) 



So, first, I will explain the
 manager role and then the executive assistant part. 



What You’ll Be Responsible For



• Loading, scheduling, and managing daily
 campaigns inside Go High Level

• Managing multiple segmentation buckets per
 (we
 3x per day across 8 audience buckets per send)

• Ensuring correct timing, tagging, logic, and automation flow for each campaign

• Monitoring campaigns for errors, missed sends, or automation issues

• Following detailed SOPs and checklists (we will train you)

• Communicating clearly if something looks off or needs review

• 

Time Commitment

• Full Time when combining
 manager and executive assistant role 

• 

Required Experience 



• Hands-on experience with Go High Level
 campaigns (we will train you on our system, but you still need GHL experience) 

• Strong understanding of campaigns, workflows, tags, and automation logic

• Proven ability to manage high-volume
 operations

• Exceptional attention to detail (this role is execution-heavy and precision matters)

• 

Ideal Candidate

• Organized, reliable, and calm under pressure

• Comfortable following systems and checklists

• Proactive communicator

• Interested in becoming a long-term
 operations manager, not a short-term freelancer



Important

This is not a beginner role. Prior Go High Level
 experience is required. We will train you on our system, but you must already know High Level. Accuracy matters. One missed automation or incorrect send can cost our company thousands. If you thrive in execution-heavy roles where precision is critical, we want to hear from you.



Executive Assistant 



In addition to managing the
 sends, you will be an executive assistant to the CEO. 



As I mentioned earlier, the
 manager will take you about 3 hours per day. Other duties you might have, may include: 



Managing slack messages

Managing Linkedin

Assisting with call scheduling 

Calendar management

Expense reporting

Help project manage different teams across projects

Writing Vendor Contracts



If you think you would be an excellent candidate for this job and you have an amazing attention to detail, here’s what you need to do right now: 



First, you need to submit your resume and a screen share video (using Loom or similar software) answering the questions: 



1. Why are you interested in the role? 





2. Why are you the right person for the job and what is your GHL experience? 



*Make sure to say Hi Jason, My name is XX and I like oranges. I need to know that the video is custom and not generic. If you do not mention oranges in your video, it will disqualify you.  



Must submit the resume and video link to this
 address: 
 



Make sure in the subject line of the
 you put: UTAH - (your name) for GHL Job 



Must be willing to work same time zone as me. Currently, central standard time in the United States. (Chicago time).



Thank you!

title: Instructional Design
description:

We are building a workforce development training platform  designed to be licensed to corporate partners



We are seeking a highly organized, strategic Instructional Design Virtual Assistant to help us digitize our existing curriculum and build out a scalable learning ecosystem over the next 60 days (with potential for ongoing work).



This role is ideal for someone who understands LMS systems, adult learning theory, and can translate in-person training into polished digital experiences.



Scope of Work (First 60 Days)



You will help us:



1?? Curriculum Digitization



Review existing curriculum (documents, slides, facilitator guides)



Organize and restructure content into modular learning paths



Convert in-person training into digital-ready formats



Align curriculum with workforce development standards



2?? LMS Build Support



Help select and/or implement LMS platform



Upload courses and structure learning paths



Create assessments, quizzes, and certificates



Support white-label configuration



Organize user roles (admin, learner, partner)



3?? Training Materials Creation



Design digital workbooks



Create facilitator guides



Refine and modernize slide decks



Build downloadable toolkits and resource libraries



Create SOP documentation for replication



4?? Instructional Design Strategy



Apply adult learning theory (ADDIE, Bloom’s Taxonomy, etc.)



Create engaging learning experiences (interactive elements, case studies)



Develop measurable learning outcomes



Structure courses for corporate licensing



5?? Future Consideration (Optional/Advanced)



xAPI or SCORM formatting knowledge



VR integration awareness



Multi-tenant LMS setup experience



Extended enterprise training models



Ideal Candidate Profile



You:



Have 2+ years in instructional design

Understand workforce development and/or corporate training



Can think strategically about scaling training programs



Are detail-oriented and deadline-driven

Graphic design skills (Canva, Adobe, Figma)



Experience building certification programs



Knowledge of hospitality training or service industry training



Deliverables (First 60 Days)

Branded workbook templates



Updated slide decks



Assessment & certificate templates



Organized Google Drive / project structure



SOP for course upload & future expansion



Time Commitment



10–20 hours per week



60-day initial contract



Opportunity for long-term retainer



Budget



Please submit:



Your hourly rate



Your preferred retainer model (if applicable)



Examples of LMS builds or curriculum projects



Platforms you’ve worked in



A short paragraph explaining how you would approach digitizing in-person training into scalable LMS modules



To Apply



Please include:



Portfolio or examples of LMS or course builds



Tools you’re comfortable with



Your availability (time zone + weekly hours)



Your rate (hourly or project-based)



A 3–5 sentence outline of how you would approach this project in the first 30 days



We are building something scalable and licensable — this is not a basic VA role. We are looking for a strategic partner who can help bring a workforce development training ecosystem to life.

title: Full-Time Video Editor & Content VA for SAT Prep Brand
description:
Overview

I run a fast-growing SAT Prep brand (“James Lu SAT”) with 70k+ followers and a paid SAT course. I’m looking for a full-time virtual assistant from the Philippines who is strong at video editing + basic VA tasks and can help me run a consistent content + community machine. You’ll be responsible for turning my raw recordings and community into daily content, happy students, and more course sales. 



Almost everything you do will have clear tutorials and SOPs.



Your Top Tasks

*Edit short-form and long-form social media content (YouTube, TikTok, Instagram)

*Make YouTube thumbnails (simple, clear designs – I provide face poses)

*Monitor and moderate an online community (remove spam, surface wins)

*Check Instagram DMs, TikTok DMs, and
 daily and reply using my scripts

*Research video ideas from comments and competitor channels

*Other odd tasks related to content, students, or the community as needed



Requirements

*Strong English (written and spoken)

*Can work full-time (40 hours/week)

*Can learn new skills fast

*Proven video editing experience (short-form + long-form)

*Comfortable using tools like CapCut / Premiere / Final Cut + Canva or similar

*Fast, reliable internet and a computer that can handle video editing

*Detail-oriented, follows SOPs, and hits deadlines without micromanagement

*Bonus: Familiarity with SAT / test prep / math content



Pay & Perks

*Salary: $700–$1,000 USD per month (full-time), depending on skill and experience

*You can work whenever you want as long as: You check community + DMs every day, and you hit the deadlines and content targets

* Flexible vacation – if you need time off, just let me know in advance

* Opportunity to advance and get bonuses – if you do a good job, I will give you raises and bonuses



How to Apply (Follow Exactly)

1. Change the subject line to: “I saw [Insert the name of my most popular YouTube video here]” (My YT channel: James Lu SAT)

2. At the top of your message, write 2–3 sentences on: Why would you like this position? and Why are you a good fit? (Do not write more than 3 sentences here.)

3. Answer this question: What is the price of the course I sell?

4. Under that, put the following, numbered for easy reading:

 a. Number of years in video editing

 b. Links to 2–3 short-form videos you have edited

 c. Link to 1 long-form video you have edited

 d. A brief list of editing and design tools you use



If you do not follow all the steps above, your application will not be considered.



If I like your application, I’ll ask you to schedule a short interview with me and give you a paid sample project to do before the interview.



During the interview, there will be a short Zoom call and video will be required.



Thank you,

James Lu

title: QuickBooks Online Real Estate Bookkeeper (1-Month Contract) — Cleanup + Reconciliations + Owner Reporting
description:
PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION BEFORE APPLYING!!!



Contract length: 1 month 

Budget: $800USD total for the month

Hours: 40 hrs/week (flexible, deadline-driven)

Start: ASAP

Software: QuickBooks Online (QBO)



We’re hiring a real-estate-experienced QuickBooks Online bookkeeper/accountant to support a growing real estate organization with multiple entities and deal types (rentals, renovations, and property operations). This role is execution-heavy: reconcile accounts, clean up the books quickly, and produce reliable monthly reports that owners/investors can trust.



You must be highly proficient in QBO and understand real estate bookkeeping norms (rent income, security deposits, CapEx vs repairs, owner draws, escrow, property-level tracking, etc.).



Core Responsibilities



QBO Cleanup + Structure

Review and clean up QBO (chart of accounts, payees/vendors, bank rules, uncategorized items)

Apply consistent categorization for real estate operations:

  - Rent income, late fees, application fees

  - Repairs & maintenance vs CapEx/improvements

  - Utilities, turnover/make-ready, landscaping, pest control

  - Property management fees, leasing fees

  - Insurance, property taxes, licenses/permits

Maintain clean classes/locations/properties (if used) for property-level reporting

 

Reconciliations + Accuracy

Reconcile bank and credit card accounts on time

- Properly record and resolve:

  - Transfers between accounts/entities

  - Credit card payments (avoid double-counting)

  - Duplicate bank-feed items and mis-mapped rules

  - Vendor credits, refunds, chargebacks



Real Estate-Specific Accounting Tasks

Track and properly classify:

   - Security deposits (liability account) and deposit returns

   - Escrow activity (tax/insurance, if applicable)

   - Loan payments split correctly (principal vs interest)

   - Owner contributions/draws and intercompany transfers

   - Rehab/renovation costs: allocate to the correct property/project

Help ensure books support lender/investor needs (clean financials, clear documentation)



Possible ongoing bookkeeping 5-7 hours weekly commitment:

 - Deliver a clean, owner-ready financial package:

 - Profit & Loss (overall + by property/class if set up)

 - Balance Sheet (clean liabilities/loans/deposits)

 - Cash summary and notes on major variances

 - A/R and A/P summary (if used)

 - Weekly update: “What’s done / what’s stuck / what we need from you”



Requirements (Must-Have)

 3+ years in QuickBooks Online (not Desktop)

Real estate bookkeeping experience (rentals + property expenses)

Strong understanding of:

Your QBO cleanup experience (describe 1 cleanup project and outcome)

mbers who worked with the founder in a prior company have followed. Two have over 11 years with the founder. Generous opportunities for personal and professional development without the corporate garbage that steals your soul.

title: Senior Data Analyst and Microsoft Power BI Developer,
description:
***Please apply for this position via the provided link. If you do not apply via this link, you will not be considered for this role: 



As a Senior Data Analyst and Microsoft Power BI Developer, you will play a critical role in how Redlist turns data into insight. Your work will directly support leadership, operations, and customer-facing teams by transforming complex datasets into clear, actionable reporting that drives better decisions.



This role is ideal for someone who loves data, understands data structures, and is eager to build highly performant, reliable dashboards while digging into data to uncover trends, and partnering closely with cross-functional teams to ensure data accuracy and clarity.





Core Responsibilities



· Partner with cross-functional teams (Engineering, Product, Customer Success, Leadership) to understand reporting needs, data definitions, and business objectives



· Design, build, and maintain interactive Power BI dashboards that are intuitive, visually clear, and decision-focused



· Analyze complex datasets to identify trends, patterns, risks, and opportunities for optimization



· Translate raw data into meaningful insights through reports, visualizations, and presentations for stakeholders



· Validate and cross-check datasets and metrics to ensure accuracy and consistency across reports



· Participate in data quality assurance efforts, identifying discrepancies and troubleshooting data-related issues



· Maintain documentation for dashboards, data sources, and reporting logic



· Continuously improve existing dashboards based on feedback and evolving business needs



· Stay current with industry best practices, Power BI features, and emerging data visualization trends





Required Qualifications



· Proven experience as a Data Analyst in Microsoft Power BI (3-5 years)



· Strong proficiency in T-SQL for querying, optimizing, transforming, and validating data (Azure SQL Server) (5+ years)



· Excellent analytical skills with the ability to turn complex data into clear, actionable insights



· Strong attention to detail and commitment to data accuracy



· Ability to work independently, manage priorities, and meet deadlines



· Excellent written and verbal English communication skills





Preferred Qualifications



· PL-400 Certification or higher



· Experience working with SaaS or operational data





About Redlist



Redlist is a SaaS company focused on helping industrial teams operate more reliably. Our software supports facilities that work with large, complex equipment by improving maintenance execution, asset health visibility, and operational consistency.



We work with customers in heavy machinery industries-manufacturing, mining, processing plants, and more-helping them reduce downtime, protect institutional knowledge, and get more value out of their equipment and their teams.





Our Values



We Are Spartan



No task is beneath anyone. When something needs to be done, we step in and do it together. We take ownership, support one another, and move forward as a unified team.



We Are Faithful We believe in continuous improvement. Growth mindset matters here - for our customers, our product, and ourselves.



We Make Impact We build solutions that matter. Everything we do is focused on delivering real, measurable value to the people who rely on our software.



We Are Doers We show up. We follow through. We earn trust by delivering consistently - rain or shine.

title: Supply Chain Manager (A player)  shopify general fashion dropshipping
description: We are a fast-growing Shopify general fashion dropshipping brand looking for an experienced Supply Chain Manager to take full control of our daily operations, supplier communication, and order flow. Your responsibilities will include monitoring daily orders inside Shopify, tracking shipments via ParcelPanel, ensuring all orders are fulfilled correctly and on time, identifying delays or tracking issues, contacting suppliers immediately if orders are not shipped, tracking numbers are invalid, parcels are stuck in customs, returned, or lost, and following up until the issue is fully resolved. You will communicate daily with suppliers (mainly China-based), request quotations for new products, negotiate pricing and shipping options, confirm stock availability, verify product details and size charts, ensure correct variants and pricing before launch, and coordinate product uploads properly. You will handle disputes, resolve fulfillment errors, fix customs issues, prevent repeated supplier mistakes, and proactively suggest improvements to reduce delivery times and improve operational efficiency. This is a full-time, long-term position requiring strong Shopify and dropshipping experience, excellent English communication skills, high attention to detail, fast response times, strong organizational skills, and the ability to work independently without supervision. Salary will be discussed based on experience. IMPORTANT: To confirm you read this job post carefully, write this word in the first line of your application: ORANGE. Applications without this word will be ignored. Also include your Shopify experience, stores you have worked with, and tools you have used. NOTE: I am only looking for an A-player Supply Chain Manager with proven high-level operational experience; if you are not an A-player with strong experience and problem-solving ability, please do not apply.

title: Executive Assistant & Operations Coordinator
description:
Looking for a Rockstar Executive Assistant & Operations Coordinator to join our team!



Bandou is a children’s headphone brand doing $3M+ in annual revenue, with official licensing deals with some of the world’s most beloved children’s brands. We’re a small, remote team that genuinely loves what we build — and we’re growing fast.



As we scale, we’re looking for someone who loves keeping things organized, gets energy from making sure everything runs smoothly, and takes real pride in being the person the team can count on. If you’re the type who notices what needs to be done before anyone asks — this role was made for you.



You’ll work closely with the founder and touch almost every part of the business — from creative and marketing to product launches, supplier relationships, and wholesale partnerships. No two weeks will look exactly the same.



What You’ll Be Doing:

- Keeping projects on track using Notion or Asana — you’re the one who knows where everything stands

- Maintaining the marketing calendar and making sure the creative team has what they need, when they need it

- Managing licensor communications and approval rounds so the founder doesn’t have to chase them

- Following up with suppliers in China, tracking samples and new product timelines

- Monitoring inventory, FBA shipments, and flagging anything that needs attention

- Supporting wholesale and retail outreach — tracking leads, coordinating pitch materials and samples

- Handling day-to-day executive support — agendas, vendor communications, keeping everything organized



You’ll Thrive Here If You’re:

- Someone who genuinely loves organization and systems — it’s not a chore for you, it’s your superpower

- Proactive and self-directed — you spot what needs doing and take care of it

- A strong written communicator in English — you’ll be representing the brand externally

- Comfortable with e-commerce tools like Shopify, Amazon Seller Central, Notion, and Google Workspace

- Someone who’s worked in e-commerce, DTC, or a startup environment before — a big plus



Let's talk!

Element Service Group is a growing mechanical services company based in North Carolina, USA. We specialize in HVAC, plumbing, and mechanical services for residential and multi-family properties.

Our company is built around professionalism, strong communication, and delivering first-class service to our customers.

We are looking for a long-term remote tea
mber in the Philippines who wants to grow with our company and become an important part of our administrative team.

This is not a short-term gig — we are looking for someone dependable who wants stability, consistent work, and the opportunity to grow into greater responsibilities over time.

________________________________________

Position Overview

The Virtual Administrative Assistant will support our U.S. operations team by helping manage service scheduling, customer communication, estimates, and administrative workflows.

This role requires a detail-oriented and highly organized professional who is comfortable working in a fast-paced service environment while maintaining accuracy and professionalism.

You will work directly with our U.S. office staff to ensure service calls are scheduled properly, customers receive clear communication, and administrative tasks are completed efficiently.

________________________________________

What Success Looks Like in This Role

A successful Virtual Assistant at Element Service Group:

• Keeps service schedules organized and technicians dispatched efficiently

• Communicates professionally with customers and tea
mbers

• Maintains accurate records of service calls, invoices, and estimates

• Follows up on open quotes and service items to keep projects moving

• Handles administrative work with high attention to detail

• Is dependable, responsive, and committed to long-term growth with the company

We value tea
mbers who take ownership of their work and take pride in helping the business run smoothly.

________________________________________

Minimum Qualifications

• High School Diploma or equivalent

• Previous experience working as a Virtual Assistant, Administrative Assistant, Dispatcher, or Customer Service Representative preferred

• Reliable internet connection and professional home workspace

________________________________________

Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities

• Strong written and verbal English communication skills

• Excellent organization and time management skills

• Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks effectively

• High attention to detail and accuracy in administrative work

• Comfortable learning and using software platforms

• Proficiency in Microsoft Office or Google Workspace

• Ability to work independently while staying responsive to team communication

Experience with the following is a strong advantage:

• ServiceTitan or similar service dispatch software

• CRM systems

• Scheduling or dispatch coordination

• Administrative support for U.S.-based companies

________________________________________

Key Responsibilities

• Answer incoming customer calls and
s professionally

• Schedule and dispatch service calls to field technicians

• Create and organize service appointments within ServiceTitan

• Follow up on open estimates and service recommendations

• Generate estimates for repairs and equipment replacements

• Maintain accurate records of service calls, invoices, and customer communications

• Assist with general administrative tasks and documentation

• Communicate clearly with technicians and office staff to ensure smooth operations

________________________________________

Work Environment

This is a fully remote position based in the Philippines working with a U.S.-based team.

Applicants must have:

• Reliable high-speed internet connection

• Quiet and professional home workspace

• Ability to work during scheduled U.S. business hours

________________________________________

Why Join Our Team

We believe in building long-term relationships with our remote tea
mbers.

With strong performance, this role can grow into:

• Senior Administrative Support

• Dispatch Coordination

• Operations Support Roles

We value reliability, professionalism, and people who want to build a career with our company, not just a temporary remote job.

________________________________________

If you are organized, detail-oriented, and looking for a stable long-term remote opportunity with a growing U.S. company, we would love to hear from you.

title: Ecommerce Reporting & Bookkeeping Specialist (Dropshipping – Part-Time)
description:
We run a high-volume Shopify dropshipping business across multiple stores and payment processors.



We are NOT looking for someone who uses accounting software.

We are looking for someone who can build and manage clean financial dashboards in Google Sheets.



Your role:



- Track daily revenue and ad spend

- Maintain structured dashboards

- Reconcile Stripe / Shopify / PayPal payouts

- Build and maintain a clean monthly P&L

- Improve and organize our existing sheets

- Keep our financial data consistent and accurate



This role requires someone who understands ecommerce cash flow and can build reporting systems from scratch.



Compensation:

$10/hour

Approx. 20 hours per month

Long-term role



To apply:



1) Change your subject line to:

"Let's organize your finances"



2) Answer the following questions:



- If you had to build a financial dashboard for a multi-store dropshipping business using only Google Sheets, what tabs would you create and what would each one track?



- Why does Shopify revenue rarely match the cash received in the bank in dropshipping? List the structural reasons.



- If Stripe, Shopify and bank balances don’t match, what is your step-by-step reconciliation process?



Applications without answers will not be reviewed.
