title: Mortgage Specialist – Track A (Processing) & Track B (Finance) – U.S. Clients (Remote, Full-Time)
description:
Location: Remote (Philippines)

Work Hours: Full-time, U.S. Business Hours (Eastern & Pacific Time Zones)

Compensation: $7–$10 USD/hour, depending on experience



About Us



We are a Canadian staffing agency partnering with U.S.-based luxury real estate and mortgage companies. Their primary talent pool historically comes from Latin America, but they are now expanding to hire top-quality talent from the Philippines.



Our team handles candidate quality control, training alignment, and process support to ensure a seamless remote work experience.



This is a specialist role, and we are looking for highly experienced candidates with strong technical skills in mortgage processing (Track A) or mortgage finance (Track B).



?? Important: We are not hiring entry-level EA roles (Track C) for mortgage. Only candidates with direct mortgage processing or finance experience will be considered.



Available Roles & Responsibilities



Track A – Mortgage Processing (Primary Tasks):



Receive and review new loan files



Collect, organize, and verify borrower documents (IDs, employment, assets, liabilities)



Submit files to the underwriter and monitor status until approval



Resolve discrepancies in borrower data and ensure file accuracy



Coordinate with loan officers and clients for smooth loan processing



Maintain detailed tracking of multiple files in progress



Ensure high-quality, error-free submissions



Track B – Mortgage Finance (Primary Tasks):



Reconcile client payments, fees, and bank charges for multiple loans



Calculate and verify borrower income and expenses



Support loan officers with financial aspects of mortgage applications



Review and ensure accuracy of credit and payment reports



Collaborate with processing teams to ensure loans meet compliance standards



Manage sensitive financial data with strict confidentiality



Note: Candidates may be asked scenario-based questions during the screening process to validate technical knowledge in either Track A or Track B.



Candidate Requirements



Minimum 1–2 years of experience in U.S. mortgage processing or finance (direct experience mandatory)



Strong understanding of U.S. mortgage lending processes, LOS systems, and credit verification



Examples: BytePro, LoanBeam, Rocket Mortgage, UWM, AUS, MSP, ER, Lender portals



High attention to detail and ability to handle multiple files simultaneously



Comfortable working with sensitive borrower and financial information



Professional home setup with quiet workspace and stable internet



Strong communication skills 
, video calls, written)



Willingness to commit to full-time U.S. business hours



? Important: Energy levels, personality type, or being soft-spoken will not be used as disqualifiers. All candidates are evaluated based on skill, reliability, and experience.



What We Offer



Competitive hourly rate with potential for growth



Fully remote work from anywhere in the Philippines



Direct exposure to U.S. mortgage and real estate industry



Structured onboarding and orientation with our Chief of Staff



Opportunity to work on multiple mortgage roles with long-term clients



Application Process



Complete the Application Form:





Book a Time for a Live Interview with the Chief of Staff:





Attend a 20–30 minute technical validation call to confirm experience and skill level.



Orientation Call: Shortlisted candidates will receive training and guidance on the client, role expectations, and final interview preparation.



Final Interview: With the U.S. client / Goldbar associate for role endorsement.



Why Apply



If you are experienced, detail-oriented, and ready to work in U.S. mortgage operations, this is your opportunity to join a structured, remote, and professional environment.



Only candidates with relevant mortgage experience in processing or finance will be considered.

title: Finance Recruiter
description:
We’re looking for an experienced Finance Recruiter with a strong track record of sourcing and hiring finance and accounting professionals for U.S.-based companies.



This role requires deep familiarity with finance functions across different stages of growth—from early-stage startups to established organizations. You will own the full recruitment lifecycle—from intake and sourcing to interview coordination and offer closure—while partnering closely with hiring leaders to ensure high-quality, business-aligned hires.

If you thrive in a fast-paced environment and excel at identifying top finance talent, this role is for you.



Core Responsibilities

• Source, screen, and recruit finance and accounting professionals for U.S.-based companies.

• Manage the full-cycle recruiting process, including job intake, candidate outreach, interviews, and offer negotiation.

• Build and maintain strong finance talent pipelines using LinkedIn Recruiter, Workable, and other sourcing platforms.

• Develop tailored sourcing strategies for roles across Accounting, FP&A, Corporate Finance, • Payroll, Tax, and Audit.

• Conduct structured interviews to assess technical expertise, analytical skills, and cultural fit.

• Partner closely with hiring managers and leadership to understand team needs, reporting structures, and hiring priorities.

• Collaborate with the People & Compliance team to ensure smooth onboarding and documentation.

• Track recruiting metrics and provide regular pipeline and progress updates to stakeholders.

• Stay current on finance hiring trends, compensation benchmarks, and market demand.



Requirements/Must-Haves

• 3–5 years of experience recruiting finance and accounting roles for U.S.-based companies.

• Strong understanding of finance positions such as Accountant, Senior Accountant, Financial • Analyst, FP&A Analyst, Controller, Bookkeeper, Payroll Specialist, Tax Associate, or Finance Manager.

• Proven ability to manage multiple requisitions simultaneously in a fast-paced environment.

• Hands-on experience with ATS platforms (Workable preferred) and sourcing tools like LinkedIn Recruiter.

• Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.

• Fluency in English required.

• Full-time availability aligned with U.S. business hours (PST overlap required).



Nice-to-Haves: 

• Experience recruiting remote finance talent in LATAM or the Philippines.

• Familiarity with independent contractor hiring models and compliance considerations.

• Experience recruiting for startups or high-growth companies.

• Exposure to finance roles supporting SaaS, e-commerce, or professional services organizations.

title: Executive Assistant to CEO
description:
Discovery Kidzone | Vision Tree Leadership™



We are hiring a full-time Executive Assistant to serve as the right hand to our CEO. This role is for a unicorn rockstar — someone who thrives in complexity, anticipates needs before they’re spoken, and brings both creative brilliance and ruthless execution.



You will manage the CEO’s professional and personal world, protect her time and energy, organize her digital life, and help scale her personal brand. This is not a task-by-task role. You are empowered to see what needs to be done and do it — without waiting for direction.



The Role at a Glance



Full-time, high-trust position



Mix of executive support, personal life management, brand execution, and systems ownership



Fast-paced, creative, and constantly evolving



Ideal for someone who loves ownership, autonomy, and impact



Key Responsibilities

Executive & Personal Support (Right-Hand Role)



Manage the CEO’s
 inbox, prioritizing, responding, and flagging action items.



Own calendar management, scheduling, and time-blocking.



Coordinate all travel arrangements, itineraries, and logistics.



Support personal life logistics including appointments, reminders, events, and planning.

Organization, Systems & Digital Management

Maintain clean, intuitive digital systems across platforms.



Format, organize, and streamline documents, forms, and processes.

Create SOPs and documentation as systems evolve.



Personal Brand, Content & Creative Execution

Create content using Canva, Gamma AI, and other creative tools.



Assist with:



Social media content



Presentations



Brand assets



Course materials



Maintain brand consistency, voice, and visual identity across platforms.



Help turn ideas, voice notes, and chaos into polished assets.



Marketing,
 & CRM Support



Write, build, and manage
 campaigns.



Support CRM and Dubsado workflows, automation, and client journeys.



Create forms, funnels, and workflows that convert.



Assist with lead management, follow-ups, and organization.



Support website updates and basic maintenance.



Learning Management & Course Support



Assist in building, organizing, and maintaining:



Online courses



Memberships



Digital programs



Upload content, organize modules, and manage course updates.



Coordinate launches, updates, and backend logistics.



What Success Looks Like



The CEO’s world feels calm, organized, and under control.



Things get done before they are asked for.



Systems are clean, scalable, and intuitive.



Creative ideas move from thought ? execution quickly.



Nothing falls through the cracks.



Qualifications



5+ years of experience as an Executive Assistant, Operations Manager, or high-level support role.



Exceptionally strong in:



Google Workspace & Microsoft Office



Jotform (advanced)



Canva & Gamma AI



CRM systems & Dubsado



Experience with websites and learning management systems.



Strong written communication and copywriting skills.



Highly organized, detail-oriented, and proactive.



Able to handle confidential information with discretion.



Creative thinker and task-driven executor.



Self-starter who does not need hand-holding or micromanagement.



This Role Is NOT for You If:



You need constant direction or checklists.



You are uncomfortable making decisions.



You prefer slow-paced or highly structured environments.



You don’t enjoy creative + operational crossover.



This Role Is PERFECT for You If:



You love being the brain behind the brilliance.



You thrive in organized chaos.



You are obsessed with systems, branding, and execution.



You take pride in making powerful leaders more effective.



You want a role with real ownership and influence.



Why This Role Is Special



Direct access to and trust from the CEO.



Work across multiple brands and creative projects.



Opportunity to grow into a Chief of Staff, Brand Director, or Operations Lead.



High-impact, high-visibility role with room to evolve.

description:
* PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE DESCRIPTION BEFORE CONTACTING *



Hey I am Jordan - the founder of a fast-growing company that helps small businesses never miss a call using an A.I. Receptionist. This is a no-brainer service, and I am looking for killers on the phone to help me introduce it to small business owners.



We are not a huge corporate where you are just a number. I am looking for 2-3 people to closely work with to make sure you are setup for success.



WHAT YOU’LL DO

- Source your own leads

- Cold call small business owners and book them for a free demo

- That’s it. You do NOT close deals. Our closing team handles the demo and the sale. Your only job is getting them to show up.



MUST HAVE (Do Not Contact If This Does Not Describe You)

- B2B cold calling experience

- Reliable internet

- Quiet workspace

- No heavy accent

- Put the phrase: "dial and smile" as your subject so I know you read this



COMPENSATION

- We offer 2 pay plans:

$2/Hour + $25/Signup

OR

$200 per signup (no hourly)

- Monthly performance bonuses also



WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR

- A true shark on the phone

- Someone who knows how to communicate, follow up, and book appointments

- Comfortable speaking with business owners all day



HOURS

- Part-time (20 hours/week)

- 2:00 AM – 6:00 AM Philippine Time



ONLY APPLY IF

- You’re a hustler

- You’re motivated by big commissions

- You have the discipline to work independently and make it happen



SUMMARY

-Its a job meant for a hustler, and you can be rewarded with huge income potential. It only takes finding 3 business owners to make $600+ a month (and that is for part time work).



CONTACT

- Do not just copy and paste a generic message, I read each one individually to see if you are a good fit

- Tell me 2 things. Your prior B2B experience AND why specifically this role works for you

title: Project-Based Graphic Designer
description:
Employment Type: Per Project / Contract-Based

Start Date: Immediate Hiring

Department: Marketing / Creative Support

Reports To: Marketing Manager / Operations Director



Position Summary

We are currently seeking a detail-oriented and creative Graphic Designer with strong proficiency in Canva to support our marketing and branding initiatives. This is a project-based role ideal for individuals who can produce high-quality visual materials, including digital and print marketing assets, promotional videos, website graphics, and brochures in a timely and efficient manner.



The selected candidate will collaborate closely with the internal team to conceptualize and execute visual content aligned with company branding and marketing objectives.



Key Responsibilities

Design visually appealing marketing materials using Canva

Create flyers, brochures, social media graphics, and promotional content

Develop short-form promotional videos for marketing campaigns

Design and update website graphics and visual layout elements

Ensure brand consistency across all digital and print materials

Collaborate with the marketing and operations teams on creative concepts

Revise designs based on feedback in a timely manner

Deliver finalized design assets within agreed project timelines

Maintain organized files for all completed and in-progress projects



Availability

Must be available to start immediately

Flexible schedule based on project demand and deadlines



Qualifications

Proven experience as a Graphic Designer or similar role

Proficiency in Canva (required)

Experience creating marketing flyers, brochures, and promotional videos

Basic understanding of website design and layout principles

Strong attention to detail and visual storytelling

Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously

Effective communication and time management skills

Ability to meet deadlines with minimal supervision



Compensation

Compensation will be determined on a per-project basis

Project scope and deliverables will be discussed and agreed upon before commencement

Payment structure may vary depending on the complexity and turnaround time of the requested design tasks

title: Full-Time Lead Generation & Outreach Specialist (Multi-Business)

title: Social Media & SEO Support VA (Canva + WordPress)
description:
Hi,



I run a growing web design and SEO agency based in Australia. We work mainly with builders, trades, and local service businesses.



We are looking for a reliable and detail oriented Virtual Assistant based in the Philippines to support us with social media content creation and basic SEO implementation tasks.



This is a long term role starting at 10 - 15 hours per week, with the opportunity to increase hours over time based on performance.



Key Responsibilities:



- Create social media posts in Canva based on structured content briefs

- Draft captions using provided keywords and tone guidelines

- Upload and schedule posts to social platforms

- Format and upload blog posts in WordPress

- Implement on page SEO including internal links, headings, meta descriptions, and image alt text

- Follow detailed checklists and processes carefully



Requirements:



- Strong Canva skills with portfolio required

- Experience working inside WordPress

- Basic understanding of SEO principles

- Strong written English

- High attention to detail

- Reliable internet connection

- Some availability overlapping Australian business hours



We value reliability, consistency, and attention to detail over speed. This role is focused on execution and support, not strategy. Clear instructions and structured training will be provided.



We are looking for someone who wants a stable long term position and to grow with the company.



To apply:



- Send examples of Canva posts you have created

- Confirm your experience using WordPress

- Write the word Precision at the top of your application



* Only applications that follow all instructions will be reviewed.



Selection Process:



- Shortlisted candidates will be given a small paid test task to assess attention to detail and quality of work.



We are looking to hire and begin onboarding in the first week of March.



Looking forward to working with the right person long term.

title: Systeme IO VA Specialist Web Designer
description:
Duration: ~10 days from project start (with possible extension)

Start date: As soon as possible



About the project

We are launching a new digital products store hosted on Systeme IO, connected to a subpage of our existing website. The initial launch includes 7 digital products. Two products are almost ready; the remaining products will be created by us and handed off to you to set up and publish (roughly one product per day).



We already have:



Brand guidelines



Welcome
 sequences



Clear launch date and structure



We now need a detail?oriented VA who can handle the build and implementation inside Systeme IO and Canva for muckups.



Your primary outcomes

By the end of the project, you will have:



Set up our Systeme IO environment and basic funnel structure for a digital product store.



Listed and configured 7 digital products (pages/sections, checkout, delivery, and basic automations).



Implemented and connected simple
 sequences to the correct triggers and tags.



Ensured the entire journey from opt?in or product page visit to purchase and delivery is smooth and tested.



Key responsibilities

Systeme IO setup & funnels



Configure account basics (settings, sender
, domain/subdomain if needed).



Create the main funnel structure (store page, product pages/sections, checkout pages, thank?you pages).



Set up and manage tags, lists, and basic automations (e.g., opt?in ? tag + welcome sequence, purchase ? tag + post?purchase
s).



Digital product listing & delivery



For each product (we provide the files and key info):



Create the product/offer inside Systeme IO.



Upload files and set up access/delivery.



Connect to the appropriate checkout page and pricing.



Ensure correct tags and follow?up automations are applied.



Test the full flow for each product (page ? checkout ? confirmation ?
 ? access).



 sequences



Create campaigns and load our existing welcome and launch sequences.



Format
s for readability, add buttons/links, and connect them to the correct funnels and triggers.



Support minor copy adjustments if needed (with guidance) and ensure everything is scheduled correctly.



Canva & visuals



Use our brand guidelines to create and/or adapt:



Product covers and mockups



Simple page/section visuals for the digital store and product pages



Export and upload graphics into Systeme IO, maintaining consistency across products and pages.



Documentation & communication



Document what you build (tags used, automations set up, funnel names/paths) so the system is clear and manageable.



Provide daily short updates at the beginning of the project (completed / in progress/questions).



Later in the project, proactively suggest improvements and manage your own task list within the agreed scope.



Requirements

Must?have



Proven experience working inside Systeme IO (please share examples or screenshots):



Funnels/pages



Products/offers



 campaigns and automations



Canva proficiency (product mockups, simple marketing graphics, on?brand designs).



Comfortable using AI tools to draft or refine copy for product descriptions, FAQs, and basic page text. (AI pro provided)



Strong attention to detail and ability to follow brand guidelines.



Reliable communication, with at least a small overlap in working hours with US Eastern Time.



Ability to work part?time for the duration of the project (a few hours per day) and meet a 10?day launch timeline.



Nice?to?have



Experience with digital product launches (courses, templates, workbooks, etc.).



Basic copywriting and understanding of conversion?focused page structure.



Experience documenting systems and creating simple SOPs.



Work style & collaboration

You will receive clear priorities and tasks from the founder/strategist daily at the beginning of the project.



As the scope becomes clear, you’ll be expected to work more independently, planning your own tasks within the agreed goals.



Strategist will be available for feedback and check-ins. Communication will be primarily async (chat (WhatsApp) + Google Meet+
), with occasional short calls if needed.

title: B2B Sales Represenatative
description:
We are a US-based custom manufacturing company, and we are looking for dedicated and loyal individuals that can contribute to our goals. We are looking for individuals who Embody Our Core Values, Serve Others and Own It!



We are looking for Sales Professionals!



Key Responsibilities:

- Identify and generate sales leads through prospecting, website inquiries, databases, cold-calling, and other promotional strategies.

- Schedule and conduct virtual meetings and presentations with potential clients.

- Develop and deliver compelling sales presentations on company products and services.

- Maintain accurate records of sales activities, prospects, and customer interactions in the company CRM.

- Track customer reorders and follow up to ensure continued satisfaction.

- Communicate customer and prospect product pain points to appropriate departments.

- Maintain a well-developed pipeline of prospects.

- Collaborate with internal teams to address customer pain points and improve offerings.

- Build and maintain strong, long-term relationships with customers and prospect.

- Consistently meet or exceed sales quotas and performance targets.



Qualifications:

- Fluent in English (both verbal and written) with excellent communication skills.

- Proven success in sales, with a strong track record of meeting or exceeding quotas.

- Ability to work independently with minimal supervision while maintaining high productivity.

- Strong relationship-building and negotiation skills.

- Self-motivated with a results-oriented mindset and a proactive approach.

- Friendly, fast learner who can adapt to change and have a “can-do” attitude

- Tech-savvy, with proficiency in Microsoft Office, Google Suite, CRM software, and virtual communication tools (e.g., Microsoft Teams, Zoom).



System Requirements:

- Computer Processor: Minimum 5th generation Intel i5 processor or equivalent

- Computer Memory/RAM: Minimum 4.00 GB

- Computer Operating System: Windows 10 or Mac OSX - No Linux, Unix, or any operating system other than what is required.

- Internet Speed: Running on a 5.0 MBPS plan or higher (Both primary and backup) - If your backup connection cannot serve as your primary connection, that does not qualify as a backup connection

- REQUIRED Headset: Noise-cancelling headset connected via USB port

- REQUIRED WebCam: At least 3 megapixels capable of 720p recording



***We’re picky. You must be smart, savvy, strategic, fun, and ready to learn fast and work hard. If you’re up for the challenge, we want to hear from you!

title: Instagram Method Client Acquisition VA
description:
About Us

We are a fast-growing media company that works with real estate agents to elevate their listings through high-quality photo, video, drone, and marketing services. We value clear communication, consistency, and tea
mbers who take ownership and love helping grow a brand.

Our work culture is friendly, fun, and energetic — but always focused on driving results. We keep things positive and collaborative while maintaining a sharp, sales-driven mindset that helps us meet our revenue goals and continue growing as a team.



Role Overview

We are hiring a focused, reliable Virtual Assistant to run daily Instagram outreach using the IG Method. The goal is simple: follow new prospects, start conversations with real estate agents, book new clients, and help fill our calendar. This role is fully dedicated to prospecting, following up, and tracking all lead activity.



Key Responsibilities

Daily IG Method Outreach

Search for real estate agents in our target areas

Send outreach messages using provided templates

Follow up with warm leads

Track every conversation in the lead tracker

Move prospects toward booking shoots or calls

Engagement

Engage with local real estate agents through likes, comments, and story replies

Maintain friendly, professional communication style

Lead Management

Update CRM or tracking sheet daily

Tag leads based on interest level

Notify the team instantly when a lead wants to book



Reporting

Send daily EOD report summarizing:

Number of DMs sent

New conversations

Warm leads

Potential bookings

Identify trends, strong scripts, and areas for improvement



Skills & Requirements

Strong written English

Confident using Instagram (search, DMs, hashtags, stories)

Able to follow scripts and messaging guidelines

Organized and consistent with daily targets

Experience with sales, outreach, or real estate is a bonus

Must be reliable with strong work ethic



Work Hours

Timezone: EST

Schedule: Monday–Friday

Hours: 20 hours/week

Daily DM target: 40–60 DMs per day



Compensation

Pay range: $4/hour

Performance bonuses available based on company performance

Long-term growth and stability for a strong performer



How to Apply

Applicants must provide:

Completed application form

1–2 minute video introducing yourself

Short explanation of why you want this role

Internet speed test screenshot

Examples of past outreach or social media experience

Submit your video via Google Drive, Loom, or YouTube link

title: Real Estate Project Manager
description: We are a fast-growing real estate investment company based in Northwest Florida seeking a high-level Virtual Project Manager / Operations Assistant to help oversee deal flow and keep projects moving from contract to closing and through rehab. This is not a basic admin role — we are looking for an organized, proactive operator who can track inspection periods, EMD deadlines, and closing timelines; coordinate with title companies, lenders, agents, and contractors; manage rehab budgets and timelines; maintain organized deal folders and CRM systems; track KPIs; and provide consistent weekly reporting so nothing falls through the cracks. The ideal candidate has experience working with real estate investors (wholesale, flips, rentals), understands contracts and the closing process, is extremely detail-oriented, tech-savvy (Google Workspace, Slack, Asana/ClickUp, CRM platforms), and comfortable managing multiple projects at once. This position starts part-time (20–30 hours per week) with opportunity for growth, performance bonuses tied to closed deals, and long-term advancement within the company.

title: SMS Campaign Specialist (Real Estate )
description:
Please review this job post completely before applying.



Job Title: SMS Campaign Specialist

Location: Remote (Must work EST hours)

Job Type: Full-Time, Long-Term

Hours: 40 hours/week

Start Date: Immediate (within the next 7 days)



About Us:



We’re a growing real estate investment company focused on off-market deals. Our acquisition team works directly with motivated sellers, and SMS outreach is a core channel for generating leads.



This is not a general VA role. We’re hiring ONLY experienced SMS specialists. If SMS was just 20% of your last job, this position is not for you.



Who We’re Looking For:



– You’ve managed daily SMS outreach as your main job — not just as a side task

– You’ve worked with tools like Launch Control, GoHighLevel, Smarter Contact, etc.

– You understand deliverability, compliance, opt-out logic, and spam filters

– You know how to tag leads, track replies, and move qualified prospects into CRM

– You’re not using a phone — you’ve used professional platforms and tools

– You can handle 1,500+ outbound texts/day and rotate templates properly

– You’re available full-time (45 hrs/week), working EST hours



Key Responsibilities:



– Run high-volume SMS campaigns daily using proper systems

– Monitor responses and qualify leads based on script and criteria

– Manage templates and rotate messages to avoid filtering

– Tag leads accurately and track campaign metrics

– Coordinate with acquisition and data teams to align campaigns



Required Experience:



– Minimum 1 year managing SMS outreach full-time

– Real estate investment or wholesaling background is a major plus

– Strong written English — clear, professional, and natural tone

– Familiarity with CRMs and SMS platforms

– Must be organized, reliable, and fully independent



How to Apply:



We only review serious applications from experienced SMS specialists.



Apply using the link below:




/1uMRkxneOR1Kn0C3UdI9_6A1avdy



Incomplete applications or generic submissions will not be reviewed.

title: Mobile Application Developer (Android & iOS) — App Refresh / Modernization
description:
We are looking for a skilled Mobile Application Developer with deep expertise in both Android and iOS platforms to lead the refresh of our existing mobile application. The app is fully built and live, but needs a modern UI/UX overhaul, performance optimization, and alignment with the latest platform standards. This is an exciting opportunity to take an established product and elevate it to the next level.



Responsibilities



Lead the complete refresh of the existing mobile application across both Android (Kotlin/Java) and iOS (Swift/SwiftUI) platforms

Redesign and modernize the user interface and user experience to meet current design standards and user expectations

Optimize app performance, including load times, memory management, battery consumption, and overall responsiveness

Refactor legacy codebase for maintainability, scalability, and adherence to modern architecture patterns (MVVM, Clean Architecture)

Update third-party libraries, SDKs, and dependencies to their latest stable versions

Ensure full compatibility with the latest Android and iOS versions, screen sizes, and devices

Implement new features and enhancements as defined by the product roadmap

Integrate with RESTful APIs, push notifications, analytics tools, and other backend services

Conduct thorough testing including unit tests, UI tests, and regression testing

Collaborate with designers, product managers, QA, and backend developers throughout the refresh process

Publish and manage app updates through the Google Play Store and Apple App Store



Requirements

Must-Have Qualifications



5+ years of professional mobile development experience with strong proficiency in both Android and iOS

Expert-level knowledge of Kotlin and/or Java for Android and Swift for iOS development

Proven experience with app redesigns, migrations, or major version refreshes

Deep understanding of mobile UI/UX principles, Material Design (Android), and Human Interface Guidelines (iOS)

Proficiency with mobile development tools: Android Studio, Xcode, Git, CI/CD pipelines

Strong experience with RESTful API integration, JSON parsing, and asynchronous programming

Familiarity with app store submission processes, guidelines, and release management for both platforms

Solid understanding of mobile security best practices, data encryption, and authentication flows



Nice-to-Have Qualifications



Experience with cross-platform frameworks such as Flutter or React Native

Knowledge of mobile analytics tools (Firebase, Mixpanel, Amplitude)

Experience with Jetpack Compose (Android) and SwiftUI (iOS)

Familiarity with GraphQL, WebSockets, or real-time data synchronization

Background in mobile accessibility standards (WCAG) and internationalization/localization

Experience with automated testing frameworks (Espresso, XCTest, Detox)

title: Long-Term Children’s Book Illustrator (Fast, Reliable, Storytelling Focused)
description:
We need 4 short story books to illustrate in 10 days. Very short books, but high-intensity, as we need these books ready for the last 9-10 days of Ramadan 2026. 



After these books, we have 136+ books to be illustrated so this will be a long term contract with our company (Blue Fish Books)



Responsibilities

* Illustrate characters, scenes, and covers for children’s books

* Maintain consistent style across books and series

* Follow briefs and meet deadlines

* Provide print-ready files



Requirements

* Strong portfolio of children’s illustrations

* Fast turnaround without sacrificing quality

* Experience with Photoshop, Procreate, or similar



Reliable and open to feedback



Work Type: Remote | Long-term

Pay: Competitive, based on experience. Paid per book. There are over 136 books ready to be worked on



To Apply:

Send portfolio link with your illustration style/ turnaround times, rates, and confirm long-term availability.

title: Graphic Designer
description:
The Role:



We're looking for a talented Graphic Designer based in the Philippines to support our growing portfolio of brands. You'll design marketing assets that communicate complex ideas clearly and look great doing it across blogs, infographics, workflows, presentations, and social media.

Excellent English communication skills

What We Offer



Fully remote, work from anywhere in the Philippines

Fast-moving, collaborative team environment

Exposure to multiple exciting tech ventures

title: Real Estate Project Manager and Virtual Assistant
description:
We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to support our team in Project Management, daily operational tasks, and Social Media Management. The ideal candidate will possess exceptional communication skills, both written and verbal, and have a proven track record of successfully managing multiple projects and tasks simultaneously.



Key Responsibilities:



Assist in the planning and execution of various projects, ensuring timelines and goals are met.



Manage day-to-day administrative tasks, including scheduling, correspondence, and document preparation.



Oversee and create engaging content for our social media platforms, ensuring alignment with our brand voice and marketing strategy.



Maintain effective communication with tea
mbers and stakeholders to facilitate project updates and collaboration.



Qualifications:



Previous experience as a Virtual Assistant or in a similar role, preferably within project management and social media environments.



Strong proficiency in communication tools and project management software.



Ability to work independently and prioritize tasks effectively.



A proactive approach to problem-solving and a keen eye for detail.

title: Sales Assistant
description:
About us: 

EMRG is an award-winning Digital Marketing Agency based in Los Angeles. With a team of experienced professionals for each service line, we offer a wide range of digital marketing solutions that are customized to meet the unique needs of each client. We are renowned for our outstanding customer service and ability to deliver exceptional `results. As a leading agency in the industry, we have established ourselves as a reliable partner for businesses looking to grow and expand their online presence.

As our company continues to grow, we are also committed to expanding our philanthropic goals and supporting children in need worldwide.



Job Title: Remote Sales Assistant - Digital Marketing



Job Description:

As a Remote Sales Assistant in the digital marketing industry, you will play a vital role in supporting the sales team and ensuring the smooth operation of the digital marketing sales process. Your primary responsibility will be to assist with various sales tasks, including lead generation, client communication, and sales administration. Working remotely, you will collaborate closely with the sales team and other stakeholders to drive sales growth and meet revenue targets.



Responsibilities:

Lead Generation:  Conduct research and identify potential clients through various online platforms: social media channels, Linked IN, Sales Navigator, and industry databases. Initiating Outbound outreach (outbound calls and sending outbound
). Collect and organize relevant information, such as contact details and company profiles, for further outreach.



Client Communication: Communicate with prospective clients via
, phone, or online messaging platforms. Introduce the company's digital marketing services, answer inquiries, and schedule appointments or product demonstrations.



Sales Support: Assist the sales team in preparing sales presentations, proposals, and contracts. Coordinate with internal teams, such as marketing and creative departments, to gather necessary materials and ensure timely delivery to clients.



CRM Management: Utilize customer relationship management (CRM) software to maintain accurate and up-to-date client records, track sales activities, and generate reports. Monitor and update the sales pipeline to reflect the progress of leads and opportunities.



Relationship Building: Foster positive and long-lasting relationships with clients, acting as a reliable point of contact. Provide exceptional customer service, address concerns, and identify opportunities to upsell or cross-sell additional digital marketing services.



Market Research: Stay informed about industry trends, competitor activities, and emerging digital marketing strategies. Share relevant insights with the sales team to refine sales approaches and stay ahead in the competitive market.



Sales Administration: Perform administrative tasks, such as data entry, document management, and sales performance tracking. Assist with the organization and coordination of sales events, trade shows, and webinars.



Requirements:

Proven experience as a sales assistant or in a similar sales support role.

Legal Marketing Experience is a plus

Able to quickly capture and summarize notes

Highly organized, Can manage tasks, deadlines, and follow-ups efficiently.

Understands client needs and project scope with ease.

Fluent, with a neutral accent preferred (but not required) for clear communication

Experience in digital marketing concepts and practices.

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.

Proficiency in using CRM software and other sales-related tools.

Self-motivated and able to work effectively in a remote work environment.

Attention to detail and ability to maintain accurate records.

Knowledge of market research techniques is a plus.



Join our dynamic digital marketing team as a Remote Sales Assistant and contribute to our mission of helping businesses achieve their marketing goals through innovative digital strategies.

, phone, or online messaging platforms. Introduce the company's digital marketing services, answer inquiries, and schedule appointments or product demonstrations.



Sales Support: Assist the sales team in preparing sales presentations, proposals, and contracts. Coordinate with internal teams, such as marketing and creative departments, to gather necessary materials and ensure timely delivery to clients.



CRM Management: Utilize customer relationship management (CRM) software to maintain accurate and up-to-date client records, track sales activities, and generate reports. Monitor and update the sales pipeline to reflect the progress of leads and opportunities.



Relationship Building: Foster positive and long-lasting relationships with clients, acting as a reliable point of contact. Provide exceptional customer service, address concerns, and identify opportunities to upsell or cross-sell additional digital marketing services.



Market Research: Stay informed about industry trends, competitor activities, and emerging digital marketing strategies. Share relevant insights with the sales team to refine sales approaches and stay ahead in the competitive market.



Sales Administration: Perform administrative tasks, such as data entry, document management, and sales performance tracking. Assist with the organization and coordination of sales events, trade shows, and webinars.



Requirements:

Proven experience as a sales assistant or in a similar sales support role.

Legal Marketing Experience is a plus

Able to quickly capture and summarize notes

Highly organized, Can manage tasks, deadlines, and follow-ups efficiently.

Understands client needs and project scope with ease.

Fluent, with a neutral accent preferred (but not required) for clear communication

Experience in digital marketing concepts and practices.

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.

Proficiency in using CRM software and other sales-related tools.

Self-motivated and able to work effectively in a remote work environment.

Attention to detail and ability to maintain accurate records.

Knowledge of market research techniques is a plus.



Join our dynamic digital marketing team as a Remote Sales Assistant and contribute to our mission of helping businesses achieve their marketing goals through innovative digital strategies.

title: Senior Account Manager
description:
Job Description: Account Manager (Digital Marketing)



We are a rapidly growing digital marketing agency based in Los Angeles seeking a highly accountable, decisive, and client-focused Account Manager to manage and grow a portfolio of client accounts. This role goes beyond basic client servicing — it requires strong judgment, confident communication, independent problem-solving, and consistent execution.

The ideal candidate is someone who can handle client pressure with composure, make informed decisions without constant escalation, and translate plans into results. You will be responsible for maintaining client trust, resolving issues proactively, and identifying opportunities to grow accounts through strategic upsells.



We prioritize personal and professional growth and offer mentoring, continued education, performance reviews with bonuses, annual raises, and a collaborative team culture.



Key Responsibilities

-Serve as the primary point of contact for assigned client accounts, maintaining clear, confident, and professional communication at all times

-Manage client expectations, address concerns independently, and resolve conflicts in a timely and solutions-oriented manner

-Make informed decisions on client matters and propose clear action plans rather than relying solely on escalation

-Lead client onboarding efficiently and ensure a strong foundation is established early in the relationship

-Coordinate with internal teams to ensure tasks are executed accurately, on time, and aligned with client goals

-Own execution of account plans, ensuring follow-through from strategy to completion

-Identify and initiate account growth opportunities, including upsells, with proper timing and client readiness

-Manage priorities effectively across multiple accounts, demonstrating strong time management and organization

-Maintain accurate task tracking, documentation, and reporting using project management tools

-Collaborate with accounting to ensure accurate billing and time tracking

-Handle special projects and new initiatives as needed





Required Skills & Qualifications

-Proven experience in client or account management (digital marketing experience preferred)

-Strong decision-making and problem-solving skills, with the ability to act independently and confidently

-Excellent written and verbal English communication skills; able to sound natural, human, and professional (not scripted or robotic)

-Ability to remain calm, structured, and solution-driven during client conflicts or high-pressure situations

-Demonstrated ability to execute plans consistently and manage time effectively across competing priorities

-Strong relationship-building skills with clients and internal stakeholders

-Familiarity with digital marketing services and workflows

-Experience using task management tools such as 
, Trello, or ActiveCollab



Ideal Candidate Traits

-High ownership and accountability

-Comfortable making decisions and proposing strategies without constant supervision

-Execution-driven and results-oriented

-Emotionally intelligent and composed under pressure

-Organized, proactive, and disciplined with time management



Important Application Requirement

-As part of our screening process, all applicants are required to submit the results of their 16PF (Sixteen Personality Factor) Assessment prior to applying.

-Applications without a submitted 16PF assessment result will not be entertained.



-16PF link: 

This assessment helps us ensure alignment with the demands of the role and our working environment.



Learn more about us

title: Trucking Recruiter (2+ Years Experience | No Lead Generation)
description:
Position: Full-Time Remote Driver Recruiter

Company: GOZAL INC

Hiring For: Owner Operators • Lease-Operators • Company Drivers



About the Role



We are a 60+ truck OTR company looking for an experienced recruiter who already understands the U.S. trucking industry. You will NOT be generating leads or posting ads.

We provide all inbound leads through our
 campaigns and company platforms.



Your job is simple: call the drivers, qualify them, and bring them into the company.



You must consistently deliver 8–12 hires per month across our three driver categories.



Responsibilities



Call inbound leads using company-provided phone service



Qualify drivers for Owner Operator, Lease-Operator, and Company Driver positions



Review experience, safety record, and basic eligibility



Clearly explain pay, structure, and expectations



Communicate with safety and onboarding to ensure smooth processing



Update lead status and hiring progress daily



Follow up with all leads until they are fully processed or disqualified



Requirements



Minimum 2 years of recruiting CDL Class A drivers in the U.S. trucking industry



Strong understanding of FMCSA basics, MVR/PSP review, and OTR requirements



Ability to consistently achieve 8–12 hires per month



Excellent English communication



Highly organized and reliable



Stable, reliable internet connection (we provide phone service)



Must work during U.S. business hours



How to Apply



Start your application with the secret word EAGLE.

Applications without the secret word will not be reviewed.

title: APPLY NOW»» Social Media & Marketing Specialist  ¤ Full Time  ¤  Strategy-Focused Role

Ready to Apply?

Send your resume to

, Instagram, and other networks)

WORK SCHEDULE & LOCATION

Long-term and stable position

title: Executive Assistant
description:
Job Summary

We are seeking a proactive, organized, and dependable Administrative Assistant to support our executives or supervisors in a remote work environment. The ideal candidate will excel in managing meetings, sending invites, updating schedules, taking detailed notes, and following up on action items until they are completed. This role requires strong communication, time management, and multitasking abilities, along with a high level of professionalism and discretion.



Key Responsibilities

• Attend meetings, take accurate notes, and provide reminders and follow-ups on discussed action items

• Send meeting invites, manage schedules, and update calendars to ensure all appointments and deadlines are met

• Proactively follow up with executives or supervisors and tea
mbers to ensure tasks are completed

• Maintain organized calendars, manage schedules, and coordinate appointments

• Answer
s on behalf of executives or supervisors, or assist with drafting, reviewing, and managing
 correspondence as directed

• Handle sensitive and confidential information with integrity

• Prioritize tasks, manage multiple assignments simultaneously, and meet deadlines

• Communicate effectively, both verbally and in writing, with executives or supervisors and colleagues

• Support executives or supervisors with project coordination, including planning, execution, and follow-up

• Collaborate with other departments to ensure smooth coordination of tasks and projects

• Utilize office software and collaboration tools such as Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Planner, Power Automate, Microsoft Office, Cisco IP Communicator, Google Workspace, and CRM systems to manage daily tasks and workflows

• Demonstrate flexibility and adaptability to changing priorities and business needs



Required Traits and Skills

• Strong organizational and time-management skills

• High attention to detail and accuracy

• Clear and professional verbal and written communication

• Ability to prioritize effectively and meet deadlines

• Discretion and confidentiality when handling sensitive information

• Proactive mindset with the ability to anticipate needs

• Tech-savvy, with experience using collaboration and productivity tools and the ability to quickly learn new systems

• Dependable, reliable, and consistent

• Strong multitasking and problem-solving abilities

• Professional demeanor in all interactions

• Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams

• Critical thinking and sound decision-making skills

• Ethical integrity and professionalism

• Experience with basic project coordination and follow-ups

• Resilience and adaptability in a fast-paced environment



Preferred Qualifications

• 5+ years of experience as an Administrative Assistant

• Experience working remotely and using tools such as Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Planner, Power Automate, or similar platforms

• Ability to work independently with minimal supervision



Schedule & Availability

• Sunday to Friday work schedule (50 hours)

• Day off: Saturday

• Primary hours: (US EST Time)

12:00 PM to 4:00 PM on Sunday (4 hours).

8:00 AM to 7:00 PM (10 hours, with a 1-hour lunch). from Monday to Thursday

8:00 AM to 3:00 PM (6 hours, with a 1-hour lunch) Friday



Pay: 10,000 to 40,000 PHP per month, depending on qualifications.





• Please apply only if you are willing and able to work this schedule and extended hours when requested



::Note::

Please send a link to your resume in Word or PDF format only, along with a voice recording explaining why you believe we should hire you, and your Speedtest result from Speedtest.net. Your application will be ignored if these requirements are not submitted.

title: Guest Communication Virtual Assistant
description:
This role will handle after-hours guest messages for Hocking Hills Treehouse Resort, a luxury resort with 8 unique treehouses.

The ideal candidate will provide friendly, professional guest support during evenings and weekends during the hours the onsite Concierge is off-duty. 

This is entirely message based and requires good written English spelling and writing. English speaking is Not required for the position, but is a bonus for communicating with us. 

Previous experience with customer service is preferred, and experience in hospitality/hotel/BNB is a plus. A genuine, joyful attitude to serve our customers is part of our company culture. We are helping make great experiences and creating memories for families, and this role will be part of that experience. 



Work Schedule



All times are Eastern Standard Time (EST) with Philippines Time (PHT) shown in parentheses.



Monday – Friday

• 5:00 PM – 9:00 PM EST

• (6:00 AM – 10:00 AM PHT, next day)



Saturday – Sunday (one of the following):

• 8:00 AM – 11:00 AM EST and 3:00 PM – 9:00 PM EST

• (9:00 PM – 12:00 AM PHT + 4:00 AM – 10:00 AM PHT)





Key Responsibilities



• Respond to guest messages in Lodgify (Airbnb and other platforms sync here)

• Answer questions about the property, amenities, check-in/check-out, and local attractions

• Resolve common issues using a provided guide

• Escalate urgent issues to the main Concierge by text or

• Provide fast, polite, high-quality guest service



Workload Expectations



• ~15–30+ guest messages per day

• ~2–3 hours of active time sensitive work per shift, with various simple tasks such as sending/responding to
 to fill other time.

• Higher message volume on weekends and around 4:00 PM EST check-in time

title: Video Editor for IG Reels and Youtube
description:
Virtual Assistant – Video Editor (Fitness / Women’s Wellness Brand)



I am a chiropractor and fitness instructor building my YouTube fitness channel and online brand. I am looking for a reliable video editor to help turn my 30-minute workout classes into clean, structured YouTube videos.



This is a long-term opportunity for someone who wants to grow with a brand from the beginning.



What You’ll Be Editing:

- Large on-screen countdown timers (45 seconds per exercise)



- Round progress indicators (Round 1 ? Round 2 ? etc.)



- Clean, colorful but minimal aesthetic



- Simple intro/outro formatting



The style will be structured and straightforward — I will provide an example video similar to what I’m looking for. We will build a repeatable template so editing becomes streamlined.



Responsibilities:



- Edit 3 workout videos per week



- Insert accurate countdown timers



- Maintain consistent formatting



- Export ready-to-upload YouTube files



- Meet reliable turnaround deadlines



Ideal Candidate:



- Experience using CapCut (required)



- Comfortable editing long-form YouTube (16:9)



- Detail-oriented (timing accuracy matters)



- Organized and efficient



- Open to growing with a brand long term



Hours & Pay:



- Approximately 10 hours per week



- $8–12/hour depending on experience



- Opportunity to increase hours as brand grows



To Apply:



- Share examples of long-form videos you have edited.



- Confirm your experience with countdown timers.



- Tell me why you would be a good fit for a growing women-focused fitness brand.

title: Technical SEO Specialist
description:
Power Automedia seeks to hire a part time to full time, skilled technical SEO specialist. We operate 8 content-driven automotive websites built on WordPress (same theme and structure across all properties). Each site has 10,000+ URLs and publishes content daily. Over the past 6 months, we’ve experienced significant organic traffic decline (20–30% month-over-month recently). Google Search Console is reporting indexing issues across multiple properties. Because all sites share the same theme and structure, we believe the root issue is systemic (technical and/or site-wide quality signals), not isolated per site.



We are seeking a senior-level Technical SEO specialist with deep experience handling large publishing websites to:



Audit one primary site

Identify root cause(s) of indexing and traffic decline

Create an actionable remediation plan

Assist with implementation

Provide guidance to roll out fixes across remaining sites



This is NOT a backlink-building role.

This is NOT a basic on-page SEO job.



We need someone strong in technical SEO and large-scale content architecture.



Scope of Work (Phase 1 – Primary Site)



Full technical SEO audit (10k+ URL WordPress site)

Deep Google Search Console analysis:

Crawled – currently not indexed

Discovered – currently not indexed

Duplicate without user-selected canonical

Google chose different canonical

Soft 404 issues

Crawl budget and indexation analysis

Sitemap structure evaluation

Canonical tag review

Robots.txt review

WordPress archive/tag/pagination review

Internal linking structure analysis

Structured data/schema validation

Thin/duplicate content identification

Core Web Vitals + performance review

Content quality signal assessment (Helpful Content / Core Update impact)

Prioritized action roadmap



If Phase 1 goes well, we will extend engagement to roll changes across all 8 properties.



Required Experience:



Please apply ONLY if you have:

5+ years hands-on SEO experience

Experience managing or auditing sites with 5,000+ URLs

Deep knowledge of WordPress technical SEO

Experience recovering sites after traffic drops

Strong understanding of:

Crawl budget optimization

Indexation management

Canonicalization issues

Large content site architecture

Helpful Content / Core Update recovery

Structured data implementation

Strong experience using:

Screaming Frog or Sitebulb

Google Search Console (advanced usage)

GA4

Ahrefs or SEMrush

Schema validation tools



Nice to Have Capabilities: 



Experience in publishing or media websites

Experience in automotive or similar niche industries

Experience handling multiple sites under shared architecture

Ability to communicate clearly in English

Ability to prioritize fixes based on impact vs effort



Job Deliverables:



Written technical audit report

Prioritized action plan (High / Medium / Low impact)

Loom walkthrough explaining findings

Implementation guidance

Measurable KPIs to track recovery



To Apply (Mandatory), please include the following in your application:



2–3 examples of large sites (5k+ URLs) you have worked on

A brief explanation of a traffic decline you diagnosed and how you fixed it

Your process when investigating “Crawled – currently not indexed”

The most common canonical mistakes you see on WordPress sites

Your hourly rate and estimated hours for a full technical audit

Tools you personally use for technical audits



Applications without these responses will not be considered.

title: Onboarding Specialist
description:
Client Onboarding Specialist — Rental Pal Pro (High-Performance Role)

Position: Client Onboarding Specialist

Company: Rental Pal Pro

Location: Remote

Employment Type: Full-Time



Read This Before Applying

Send all Applications To 

This is not a basic customer support role.

Rental Pal Pro works with business owners who expect speed, clarity, and execution. We are looking for a high-accountability operator who can take ownership of client onboarding and ensure every customer successfully launches their system without delays or hand-holding.

If you need constant supervision, struggle with deadlines, or prefer slow-paced environments — this role will not be a fit.



Mission of This Role

Your responsibility is to move clients from purchase ? fully operational as fast and efficiently as possible.

Success in this position means:

Clients launch quickly

Systems work correctly

Questions are solved proactively

Operational friction is eliminated

You are measured by outcomes — not activity.



What You Will Own

Client Implementation

Lead onboarding calls with new clients

Guide business owners through system setup step-by-step

Ensure CRM, automation, and communication tools are fully configured

Drive clients toward completion without delays



System Activation

Configure pipelines, calendars, workflows, and messaging systems

Verify integrations and automation performance

Ensure every client reaches launch readiness

Troubleshoot setup issues independently when possible



Client Accountability

Follow up with clients who fall behind

Maintain onboarding timelines

Keep onboarding 
ntum moving at all times

Escalate only true operational blockers



Operational Discipline

Follow SOPs precisely

Document onboarding progress accurately

Maintain clean internal tracking systems

Identify repeat problems and recommend process improvements



Performance Metrics (Non-Negotiable)

Onboarding completion rate

Time-to-launch speed

Client activation success

Meeting attendance & punctuality

Client satisfaction during onboarding



Minimum Requirements

Excellent spoken and written English

Confident leading live video calls

Strong technology adaptability

Experience with CRM or SaaS platforms

Reliable internet and professional workspace

Ability to manage multiple clients simultaneously



Preferred Experience

GoHighLevel or CRM implementation experience

SaaS onboarding or technical support

Remote client-facing roles

Process-driven work environments



Who Thrives Here

You will succeed if you:

Take ownership without being asked

Move fast while maintaining accuracy

Communicate clearly and professionally

Solve problems instead of escalating them

Operate with urgency and accountability



Who Should NOT Apply

Individuals seeking passive support roles

Applicants uncomfortable with accountability metrics

Those who wait for instructions instead of taking initiative

Candidates who struggle managing deadlines or multiple tasks



Growth Path

Top performers may advance into:

Senior Onboarding Specialist

Client Success Manager

Operations Manager



Application Instructions

To be considered, include the following:

A short video introduction (2–3 minutes)

Your experience with CRM or onboarding systems

Why you believe you perform well in fast-paced environments

Incomplete applications will not be reviewed.

title: Social Media Content Creator in an Inclusive Environment
description:
Reels + Canva Graphics + Scheduling | Part-Time 



Hi! I run a marketing agency that supports purpose-driven brands. We work with a variety of clients including:

podcasts, wellness educators, community organizations, etc. 



I’m looking for a detail-oriented Social Media Content Creator who can turn long-form content into engaging short-form posts and help schedule content consistently. 



This is a long-term opportunity for someone who is organized, creative, and reliable. It starts off part-time, with the opportunity to grow into full-time if it's a good fit. I prioritize an inclusive, compassionate, and communicative working environment. 



What You’ll Be Doing:



Short-Form Video Creation

- Pulling strong highlights from podcast episodes

- Putting short clips together to tell a story

- Editing 30–60 second vertical Reels / YouTube Shorts

- Adding clean, accurate captions

- Occasionally adding b-roll 

- Keeping all edits clean, professional, and brand-aligned



Canva Graphic Creation

- Creating carousel posts

- Designing reel covers

- Replicating brand styles

- Matching fonts and color palettes accurately



Social Media Scheduling

- Uploading and scheduling posts via Instagram / Meta Business Suite / YouTube 

- Following a content calendar

- Double-checking formatting before publishing

- Ensuring captions and hashtags are correct



Required Skills

- Experience creating Reels / Shorts

- Strong English comprehension (important for caption accuracy)

- Attention to detail and natural leadership is very important in this role.



Experience with:

- CapCut / Premiere Pro / Edits / similar editing software

- Canva

- Instagram / Meta Business Suite

- Ability to follow brand examples carefully

- Strong attention to detail

- Proactive communication



Hours

- 10–15 hours per week to start

- Opportunity to grow as agency expands

- Long-term role for the right person



Pay

- $300/month to start. 

- Bonuses are performance based. 



To Apply:

Please include:

- 2–3 examples of short-form videos you edited

- 1–2 examples of Canva graphics (carousel or branded post)

- The word “Compass” in your subject line

- Your current availability

- Bonus: In 2–3 sentences, tell me what makes a Reel engaging without being "clickbait".



This is a structured, organized role. We value reliability, clean execution, and brand consistency. 

If that sounds like you, I’d love to hear from you.

title: Grant Writer & Funding Strategist
description:
Grant Writer & Funding Strategist (Arts + Public Projects)



We’re seeking a Grant Writer & Funding Strategist to support our creative studio with identifying, applying for, and managing funding opportunities. This role goes beyond writing and includes researching grants, RFQs, and RFPs, shaping competitive narratives, and helping position the studio for long-term sustainability and growth.



Responsibilities

- Research and identify relevant grants, RFQs, and RFPs (arts, public art, community, and institutional funding)

- Write and submit compelling grant applications, proposals, and required narratives

- Assist with RFQ/RFP responses, including project descriptions, budgets, timelines, and qualifications

- Track deadlines, submission requirements, and follow-up materials

- Coordinate with the artist/team to gather materials (statements, bios, images, work samples)

- Help refine language to align with funder goals, community impact, and artistic vision

- Maintain a simple system for tracking submissions, awards, and reporting requirements



Ideal Fit

- Experience with arts, public art, nonprofit, or community-based funding

- Strong writing, editing, and organizational skills

- Comfortable translating creative work into clear, funder-aligned language

- Proactive, detail-oriented, and able to work independently

- Familiarity with RFQs/RFPs for public art or cultural projects is a plus



Structure

- Part-time or full-time

- Flexible hours

title: Educational Sales Associate – Career Training Programs
description:
Are you passionate about education and skilled in building meaningful connections? Do you have strong English communication skills and a deep familiarity with U.S. culture? Join a leading U.S. online career school that empowers students to achieve their dreams in Information Technology and Project Management. We are seeking Educational Sales Associates who can inspire students, guide them toward the right career path, and represent our programs with professionalism and confidence.



Responsibilities:

• Serve as the primary point of contact for prospective students, guiding them through the enrollment process.

• Present and promote our training programs, highlighting their value in preparing students for high-demand careers.

• Conduct consultations to understand student needs, goals, and financial considerations, and recommend appropriate programs.

• Follow up with leads, build strong relationships, and close enrollments.

• Collaborate with admissions, support, and academic teams to ensure a seamless student onboarding experience.

• Stay informed on current industry trends, certification requirements, and job market opportunities to best advise students.

• Participate in regular tea
etings, sales training sessions, and ongoing professional development.

Requirements:

• Proven sales, admissions, or customer service experience with a strong record of meeting or exceeding goals.

• Strong English proficiency and cultural familiarity with the United States (required to communicate effectively with U.S. students).

• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, both written and verbal.

• Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively within a team.

• Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.

• Familiarity with IT and business career certifications (e.g., CompTIA A+, PMI PMP) is a strong plus.

• Comfortable working in a fast-paced, remote environment.

• Bachelor’s degree required.

• Availability to work Monday to Friday, 10:00 AM – 6:30 PM EST.

Compensation & Benefits:

• Fixed Salary: $1,200 – $1,600 USD per month

• 100% remote work

• Opportunities for professional growth in the U.S. education and training sector

• Training and career development support provided

• Collaborative, supportive team culture

• Clear career progression with the potential to advance into senior admissions, management, or team leadership roles

title: TikTok Engagement + Outreach VA
description:
Job Posting: TikTok Engagement + Outreach VA



Title: TikTok Engagement Specialist — Designer Menswear Brand

Type: Part-time, Remote

Hours: 10-20 hours/week (flexible, room to grow)

Pay: $5-7/hour



About Us

KingsCloset is a peer-to-peer rental marketplace for designer menswear. Think Rent the Runway, but for guys who want to wear Rick Owens, Chrome Hearts, Amiri, and Margiela without dropping $2k+ on a single piece.

We’re pre-launch and building buzz on TikTok.



The Role

You’ll start by monitoring and replying to comments on fashion TikTok videos — inserting KingsCloset naturally into conversations where people are talking about designer clothes they want but can’t afford.

Once you’ve proven yourself, you’ll take on influencer outreach — finding and contacting creators in the elevated menswear and streetwear space to partner with us.

This role has room to grow into a larger social media and partnerships position.



Phase 1: Comment Engagement

 ? Monitor TikTok videos in the menswear/streetwear/designer fashion space

 ? Find comments from people who would benefit from KingsCloset

 ? Reply naturally and helpfully (not salesy, not robotic)

 ? Track your replies in a simple spreadsheet (video URL, comment, your reply)

 ? Report weekly: what’s working, what’s not, any trends you notice



Phase 2: Influencer Outreach (After Onboarding)

 ? Find TikTok and Instagram creators in elevated menswear, streetwear, and designer fashion

 ? Build lists of potential partners with contact info, follower count, engagement rate, and content style

 ? Send outreach DMs and
s using templates we provide

 ? Track responses and manage conversations

 ? Help coordinate partnerships and content

We’re looking for creators who wear actual designer pieces — Rick Owens, Chrome Hearts, Kapital, Margiela, Raf Simons — not fast fashion styled to look expensive.



Example Comments to Reply To

Someone says:

“I wish I could afford this Rick Owens jacket”

You reply:

“there’s actually a site where you can rent designer stuff for like 10% of retail — check out kingscloset”

Someone says:

“need a fit for my friend’s wedding but can’t drop $1k”

You reply:

“look into renting — kingscloset has designer pieces you can rent for way less than buying”



What We’re Looking For

 ? You actually understand men’s fashion and streetwear culture

 ? You know the difference between Rick Owens and Zara, between archive Raf and H&M

 ? You can write casually and naturally (no corporate speak, no spam energy)

 ? You’re on TikTok and Instagram already and understand the culture

 ? You’re reliable, self-motivated, and can work independently

 ? You’re comfortable doing outreach and talking to people

 ? Bonus: Experience with influencer marketing, community management, or social media



What You’ll Need

 ? Your own TikTok account (aged, not brand new)

 ? Reliable internet

 ? Ability to work flexible hours (comments happen all day)

 ? Basic spreadsheet skills (Google Sheets)

 ? Good written English



To Apply

Send me:

 1. A short intro about yourself and why this role interests you

 2. Your TikTok and/or Instagram handle (so I can see what content you engage with)

 3. 3 example replies you would leave on fashion TikTok comments (make them up, show me your voice)

 4. Name 2 TikTok or Instagram creators you think would be a good fit for KingsCloset and why

 5. Your hourly rate expectation

 6. How many hours/week you’re available



Bonus Points

 ? You already follow accounts 
 
 

 ? You know what Grailed, SSENSE, Farfetch, and END are

 ? You’ve bought or sold archive/designer pieces before

 ? You’ve done influencer outreach or creator partnerships before



This role is perfect for someone who loves fashion, is chronically online, and wants to grow with an early-stage startup.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

title: Account Manager
description:
Job Description: Account Manager (Digital Marketing)



We are a rapidly growing digital marketing agency based in Los Angeles seeking a highly accountable, decisive, and client-focused Account Manager to manage and grow a portfolio of client accounts. This role goes beyond basic client servicing — it requires strong judgment, confident communication, independent problem-solving, and consistent execution.

The ideal candidate is someone who can handle client pressure with composure, make informed decisions without constant escalation, and translate plans into results. You will be responsible for maintaining client trust, resolving issues proactively, and identifying opportunities to grow accounts through strategic upsells.



We prioritize personal and professional growth and offer mentoring, continued education, performance reviews with bonuses, annual raises, and a collaborative team culture.



Key Responsibilities

-Serve as the primary point of contact for assigned client accounts, maintaining clear, confident, and professional communication at all times

-Manage client expectations, address concerns independently, and resolve conflicts in a timely and solutions-oriented manner

-Make informed decisions on client matters and propose clear action plans rather than relying solely on escalation

-Lead client onboarding efficiently and ensure a strong foundation is established early in the relationship

-Coordinate with internal teams to ensure tasks are executed accurately, on time, and aligned with client goals

-Own execution of account plans, ensuring follow-through from strategy to completion

-Identify and initiate account growth opportunities, including upsells, with proper timing and client readiness

-Manage priorities effectively across multiple accounts, demonstrating strong time management and organization

-Maintain accurate task tracking, documentation, and reporting using project management tools

-Collaborate with accounting to ensure accurate billing and time tracking

-Handle special projects and new initiatives as needed





Required Skills & Qualifications

-Proven experience in client or account management (digital marketing experience preferred)

-Strong decision-making and problem-solving skills, with the ability to act independently and confidently

-Excellent written and verbal English communication skills; able to sound natural, human, and professional (not scripted or robotic)

-Ability to remain calm, structured, and solution-driven during client conflicts or high-pressure situations

-Demonstrated ability to execute plans consistently and manage time effectively across competing priorities

-Strong relationship-building skills with clients and internal stakeholders

-Familiarity with digital marketing services and workflows

-Experience using task management tools such as 
, Trello, or ActiveCollab



Ideal Candidate Traits

-High ownership and accountability

-Comfortable making decisions and proposing strategies without constant supervision

-Execution-driven and results-oriented

-Emotionally intelligent and composed under pressure

-Organized, proactive, and disciplined with time management



Important Application Requirement

-As part of our screening process, all applicants are required to submit the results of their 16PF (Sixteen Personality Factor) Assessment prior to applying.

-Applications without a submitted 16PF assessment result will not be entertained.



-16PF link: 

This assessment helps us ensure alignment with the demands of the role and our working environment.



Learn more about us

title: Part-Time Video Editor
description:
Part-Time Video Editor (Adobe Premiere Pro Required)

Remote | 10–25 hrs/week | Ongoing Work Available



I run a growing creative studio producing short-form content for creators and brands. I’m looking for a skilled, detail-oriented video editor who can deliver clean, professional edits consistently.



This is not beginner work.



Before applying, please review the editing standard here:





If your work is not at this level, this role will not be a fit.



Responsibilities:



* Edit short-form videos (Reels / TikTok / YouTube Shorts)

* Match provided references and pacing precisely

* Deliver clean audio (balanced levels, no sync errors)

* Add captions and light motion elements

* Deliver organized Premiere project files

* Meet deadlines consistently



Required:



* Strong proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro

* Portfolio of short-form edits

* Understanding of pacing and retention

* Clean export workflow

* Reliable communication



Experience in DaVinci Resolve for color is a plus, but not required.



Applications without a portfolio will not be reviewed.



This role is not a fit if:



* You miss deadlines

* You require heavy supervision

* You cannot follow references precisely

* You do not double-check audio and exports

* You are looking for creative control instead of execution



I value professionalism and consistency.



Trial Process:



We will begin with a paid trial batch to evaluate technical quality, speed, communication, and alignment with style.



Strong performers will receive ongoing weekly work.



To Apply:



1. Send 3 short-form videos you edited

2. Confirm you use Adobe Premiere Pro

3. Share your weekly availability

4. Share your internet speed

5. Write “BLUEBERRY” at the top of your application



If you are reliable, detail-oriented, and can deliver high-standard edits consistently, apply.
